analyzed: khams btus pa zhes bya ba ni khams thams cad bsdus pa'i don gyis so //
translated: The word collection means the collection of all elements.

original: 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnas nyi shu dang / bcu bdun dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ngo bos khams gsum gyi mtshan nyid can no //🔽de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnas nyi shu dang / bcu bdun dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ngo bos khams gsum gyi mtshan nyid can no // de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The words desire, etc. refer to the characteristics of the three realms, which are the natures of the twenty, seventeen, and four meditative absorptions.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi mtshan nyid do // zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, The characteristics of the three worlds.

original: 'khor ba'i 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The characteristics of the world of samsara are the characteristics of purity.

original: de ltar de'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the nature of their purity,

original: da ni de rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i rim pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i rim pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the sequence of the entities of their causes and results,🔽it is said:

original: rtsa ba gsum dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rtsa ba gsum dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The three nāḍīs are the root,

original: de ma thag par gsungs pa'i rtsa gsum po rtsa ba ste /
analyzed: de ma thag par gsungs pa'i rtsa gsum po rtsa ba ste /
translated: the three nāḍīs that were just mentioned are the root,

original: gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the principal ones.

original: 'bras bu gcig ces bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i rtsa gnyis po rgyu ba nye bar mtshon pas gcig ni dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig ces bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i rtsa gnyis po rgyu ba nye bar mtshon pas gcig ni dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: The one fruit is the fruit of the central nāḍī, the avadhūti,

original: de'i rim pas de la nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rim pas de la nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is observed in that [nāḍī] through its stages.🔽In order,

original: rim bzhin zhes bya ba ni rim pa la brten nas so //
analyzed: rim bzhin zhes bya ba ni rim pa la brten nas so //
translated: means in dependence on the stages.🔽Having reached the dharmacakra

original: chos kyi 'khor lor son zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i padma la gnas pa'i sems kyi gnas nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lor son zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i padma la gnas pa'i sems kyi gnas nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: means that the mind is located in the heart lotus.🔽The emanation

original: sprul pa zhes bya ba ni lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: sprul pa zhes bya ba ni lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: is the emanation cakra at the navel.🔽Those three

original: de gsum zhes bya ba ni la la n'a sogs gsum mo //
analyzed: de gsum zhes bya ba ni la la n'a sogs gsum mo //
translated: are the three, lalanā, and so on.🔽Clear

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni gsum po nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum la snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni gsum po nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum la snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: means that the three appear in the direct perception of yoga.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: de'i phyir sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he declares, “body,” etc.

original: khrag 'bab pa nyid dang / khu ba 'bab pa nyid dang me 'bab pa nyid kyis rim pa ji lta bar lus la sogs pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: khrag 'bab pa nyid dang / khu ba 'bab pa nyid dang me 'bab pa nyid kyis rim pa ji lta bar lus la sogs pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the purification of the body, etc. is due to the flow of blood, the flow of semen, and the flow of fire, respectively.

original: de ltar de rnams nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i rim pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de rnams nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i rim pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the sequence of the nature of cause and effect of those,

original: da ni de'i nyes pa 'char ba na //
analyzed: da ni de'i nyes pa 'char ba na //
translated: now, in order to declare the arising of their faults,

original: 'chi ba 'byung ba brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'chi ba 'byung ba brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: he declares the arising of death.

original: gang tshe de la nad sbyor ba //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽nad ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang tshe de la nad sbyor ba // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / nad ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: When the combination of illnesses

original: de la zhes bya ba ni lus la'o //🔽gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus @189b gang la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni lus la'o // gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus @189b gang la'o //
translated: occurs in the body,🔽the three channels

original: de rnams la zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum po la'o //
analyzed: de rnams la zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum po la'o //
translated: are blocked by the three humors.🔽When that happens,

original: de tshe zhes bya ba ni lus de la'o //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba ni lus de la'o //
translated: the body is afflicted by illness.

original: gzas 'dzin mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi zla ba la sgra gcan gyis 'dzin pa ltar 'chi ltas kyi rtags 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzas 'dzin mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi zla ba la sgra gcan gyis 'dzin pa ltar 'chi ltas kyi rtags 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The characteristic of the seizing of the moon is like Rāhu seizing the external moon, because the signs of the death omens arise.

original: cung zad nad ces bya ba ni yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'o//
analyzed: cung zad nad ces bya ba ni yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'o//
translated: A little illness is an incomplete nature.

original: gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gang la'o //
analyzed: gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gang la'o //
translated: When is at any time.

original: 'gro zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis 'gro ba'o //
translated: Going is their going.

original: de tshe zhes bya ba dus der ro //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba dus der ro //
translated: Then is at that time.

original: phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi zla ba la sogs pa la sgra gcan gyis phyed bsgribs pa ltar 'chi rtags yongs su rdzogs pa mi skyed pa'i phyir ro//🔽srog gi zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i dus su 'byung ba'i srog gi rlung gis so //
analyzed: phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi zla ba la sogs pa la sgra gcan gyis phyed bsgribs pa ltar 'chi rtags yongs su rdzogs pa mi skyed pa'i phyir ro// srog gi zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i dus su 'byung ba'i srog gi rlung gis so //
translated: The characteristic of the half-seizing is like Rāhu obscuring half of the external moon, because it does not generate the complete arising of the death signs.🔽When the life-

original: bcom na zhes bya ba ni kun nas gdungs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom na zhes bya ba ni kun nas gdungs pa'o //
translated: force is destroyed is when the life-force wind that arises at the time of death destroys it.

original: gang phyir zhes bya ba ni dus gang gi tshe zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang phyir zhes bya ba ni dus gang gi tshe zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Since is because of that time.

original: de nyid tshe na zhes bya ba ni dus de nyid kyi tshe na'o //
analyzed: de nyid tshe na zhes bya ba ni dus de nyid kyi tshe na'o //
translated: At that very time means at that very moment.

original: 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The characteristic of death means the cessation of the faculty of life.

original: de ltar nyes pa 'char ba la 'chi ba 'byung ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar nyes pa 'char ba la 'chi ba 'byung ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the arising of faults, death arises.

original: da ni nye bar bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas man ngag gis rtogs par bya ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni nye bar bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas man ngag gis rtogs par bya ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the realization by means of instruction, preceded by a summary,

original: rtsa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rtsa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the principal nāḍīs, and so on, are mentioned.

original: skye ba dang 'chi ba dang thar pa'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'chi ba dang thar pa'i gnas skabs so //
translated: The three states are birth, death, and liberation.

original: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi'o //
analyzed: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi'o //
translated: The third is of the three nāḍīs.

original: gtso bo nyid du nges zhes bya ba ni gtso bo nyid du yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: gtso bo nyid du nges zhes bya ba ni gtso bo nyid du yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: Ascertained as principal means fully understood as principal.

original: rgyas par zhes bya ba ni rgya che bar ro //
analyzed: rgyas par zhes bya ba ni rgya che bar ro //
translated: Extensive means extensive.

original: rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni gnas la sogs pa las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi drung nas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni gnas la sogs pa las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi drung nas so //
translated: The yoginīs’ wheel means from the presence of the assembly of yoginīs born from the places, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor ba yis zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba yis zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The yogin is one who is abiding in the stage of completion.

original: gsal por zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byas nas so //
analyzed: gsal por zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byas nas so //
translated: The clearly is that having made clear.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: The knows is that which is to be known.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The glorious Vajra Garland Tantra of the Great Yoga

original: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: is the great commentary composed by the paṇḍita Alaṃkakalaśa.

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the thirty-first chapter from the explanatory tantra of the glorious Vajraśekhara called “The Illumination of the Profound Points.”

original: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pas mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pas mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having described the reply to the question about the three channel locations in the thirty-first chapter,

original: da ni rlung la sogs pa'i rnam par @190a * //
analyzed: da ni rlung la sogs pa'i rnam par @190a * //
translated: now, in order to teach the divisions of the winds and so on

original: dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir dang / rlung skyed pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir dang / rlung skyed pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: and to teach the reply to the question about the location of the wind generation,

original: le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nye bar 'god cing /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nye bar 'god cing /
translated: the thirty-second chapter is set forth.

original: dang por re zhig de la rtsom pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de la rtsom pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: First, at the outset, he says, “Then, ” and so on.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o//
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o//
translated: After explaining chapter thirty-one,

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “and also” is as before.

original: rlung gi mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams kyi bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid de bshad kyis nyon mongs zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams kyi bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid de bshad kyis nyon mongs zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: The characteristics of the vāyus are the characteristics that generate the vāyus.

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does that do?

original: de'i phyir / ji ltar dngos su yang dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / ji ltar dngos su yang dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “How is it directly real?

original: gang gi phyir rlung rnams bskyed pas so ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir rlung rnams bskyed pas so ;
translated: ” Because the vāyus are generated.

original: / dngos zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid du'o //
analyzed: / dngos zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid du'o //
translated: “ Directly” means in a direct perception.

original: dus ni zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid can dang / nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can la'o //
analyzed: dus ni zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid can dang / nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can la'o //
translated: “ Time” is the characteristic of the external movement of the sun, moon, and so on, and the characteristic of the internal exhalation and inhalation.

original: yongs su slu byed yin zhes bya ba ni de las bzlog pa'i rnam pa'o//
analyzed: yongs su slu byed yin zhes bya ba ni de las bzlog pa'i rnam pa'o//
translated: “Deceptive” is the opposite of that.

original: yang dag shes zhes bya ba snga ma dang 'brel to //
analyzed: yang dag shes zhes bya ba snga ma dang 'brel to //
translated: “Right knowledge” is connected with the previous [line].

original: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the undertaking of that [right knowledge],

original: da ni de dngos su bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de dngos su bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to directly teach that,

original: de'i yan lag par do'i srid pa'i rnam shes 'jug pa ni /🔽bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid //
analyzed: de'i yan lag par do'i srid pa'i rnam shes 'jug pa ni / bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid //
translated: he says, “The engagement of consciousness in the existence of the intermediate state, which is a part of that [right knowledge],”

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “The afflicted mind of propensities” and so forth.

original: bag chags kyi sgras ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnyis so //
analyzed: bag chags kyi sgras ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnyis so //
translated: Here, the word “propensities” refers to both the foundation consciousness and the afflicted mind.

original: rlung gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ni srog dang thur sel gyi rlung dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ni srog dang thur sel gyi rlung dang bcas pa'o //
translated: “By the nature of wind” means together with the life-force and downward-voiding winds.

original: gzugs gzhan byed ces bya ba ni dbang po tshang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs gzhan byed ces bya ba ni dbang po tshang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Causing other forms” means because the faculties are complete.

original: don ni nges par yod mi shes //
analyzed: don ni nges par yod mi shes //
translated: “The object is not known to be definitely existent”

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi las kyi dbang gi nges pas gang de don ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi las kyi dbang gi nges pas gang de don ni /
translated: means that by the power of one’s own karma, the object

original: sngon po la sogs pa rnams la ste /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa rnams la ste /
translated: is not definitely existent in blue and so forth.

original: yongs su shes pa ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa ni shes pa'o //
translated: Knowledge is the knower.

original: des mi shes pa ni khyogs kyi bzhon pa ltar mya ngan la sogs pas bsgribs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des mi shes pa ni khyogs kyi bzhon pa ltar mya ngan la sogs pas bsgribs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not known by that, because it is obscured by grief, etc., like a person on a palanquin.

original: rlung tsam zhes bya ba ni grib ma lta bu nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyi gzugs dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rlung tsam zhes bya ba ni grib ma lta bu nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyi gzugs dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is mere wind, because it is free from the form of characteristics, like a shadow.

original: bkug nas ni zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bkug nas so //
analyzed: bkug nas ni zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bkug nas so //
translated: Having drawn it in means having drawn it in properly.

original: kun gzhi'i rnam shes zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi rten sprul pa gnyid log pa lta bu'o //🔽bag chags nang du rnam par spyod //
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam shes zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi rten sprul pa gnyid log pa lta bu'o // bag chags nang du rnam par spyod //
translated: The store consciousness is the basis of the latent impressions, which is like an emanation or a sleeping person.🔽The latent impressions move about inside it.

original: ces bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bag @190b chags rnams kyi nang du rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bag @190b chags rnams kyi nang du rgyu ba'o //
translated: Inside means inside the various latent impressions.

original: cig car zhes bya ba ni dus mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: cig car zhes bya ba ni dus mnyam pa'o //
translated: Simultaneously means at the same time.

original: rlung dang rnam shes gnyis zhes bya ba ni srog rtsol gyi rlung dang kun gzhi'i rnam shes so //
analyzed: rlung dang rnam shes gnyis zhes bya ba ni srog rtsol gyi rlung dang kun gzhi'i rnam shes so //
translated: The two, wind and consciousness, are the winds of life and exertion and the store consciousness.

original: bag chags dang 'dres zhes bya ba ni rang gi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bag chags kyi dbang gis so //
analyzed: bag chags dang 'dres zhes bya ba ni rang gi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bag chags kyi dbang gis so //
translated: “Mixed with habitual tendencies” means by the power of one’s own habitual tendencies, whether virtuous or nonvirtuous.

original: rim pa las zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i srid pa 'gog pa'i rim pas so //🔽rang gi bag chags bsgom pa yis //
analyzed: rim pa las zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i srid pa 'gog pa'i rim pas so // rang gi bag chags bsgom pa yis //
translated: “In order” means in the order of the cessation of the existence at death.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lhan cig skyes pa'i bag chags rnam smin las so //🔽de nas zla mtshan dus su ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lhan cig skyes pa'i bag chags rnam smin las so // de nas zla mtshan dus su ni //
translated: “One’s own habitual tendencies” means one’s own innate habitual tendencies.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar gyur pa'i mngal rang byung gi me tog 'byung ba'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar gyur pa'i mngal rang byung gi me tog 'byung ba'i tshe na'o //
translated: “Then, at the time of menstruation” means when the womb, which has come into existence, is in the state of the arising of the natural flower.

original: 'jug pa ni zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'jug pa na'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'jug pa na'o //
translated: “Entering” means entering in.

original: de dag na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In them” means

original: rlung dang rnam par shes pa dag / ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rlung dang rnam par shes pa dag / ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: in the wind and consciousness.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: de'i phyir mngal gyi rtsa la zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽cha dang 'brel pa'i ma skyes pa //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngal gyi rtsa la zhes bya ba gsungs te / cha dang 'brel pa'i ma skyes pa //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “in the channels of the womb.”

original: zhes bya ba'i ming can la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ming can la'o //
translated: “Unborn” means “connected with a part.”

original: de zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
translated: “Then” means after that.

original: khu ba khrag zhu thig les zhes bya ba ni khu ba dang khrag gi rang bzhin zhu ba'i thig le rnams kyis so //
analyzed: khu ba khrag zhu thig les zhes bya ba ni khu ba dang khrag gi rang bzhin zhu ba'i thig le rnams kyis so //
translated: The “drops of semen and blood” are the drops that melt from the nature of semen and blood.

original: 'dres pa yis ni rnam shes skye //
analyzed: 'dres pa yis ni rnam shes skye //
translated: Consciousness arises from their mixture.

original: zhes bya ba ni bar do'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bar do'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is the consciousness of the intermediate state.

original: dpe bstan pa'i phyir /🔽ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin //
analyzed: dpe bstan pa'i phyir / ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin //
translated: In order to illustrate this,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: it is said, “like the taste of alcohol.”🔽Just as the taste of alcohol is not distinguished by those who are intoxicated,

original: ji ltar chang gi ro la myang ba rnam par ma phye bar gyur pas gnas pa de bzhin du kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa mngal gyi rtsa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar chang gi ro la myang ba rnam par ma phye bar gyur pas gnas pa de bzhin du kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa mngal gyi rtsa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: in the same way, the consciousness of the ground-of-all enters the womb, that is, the womb of the mother.

original: rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Consciousness arises.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa nyid las nyon mongs can yid ces bya ba dang 'brel to//
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa nyid las nyon mongs can yid ces bya ba dang 'brel to//
translated: This is connected to the previously mentioned “afflicted mind.”

original: ji lta bu zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / rnam shes kyis ni bag chags 'dzin //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir / rnam shes kyis ni bag chags 'dzin //
translated: In what way?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “consciousness holds the habitual tendencies.”

original: sa bon gyi ngo bo 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: sa bon gyi ngo bo 'dzin par byed do //
translated: It holds the seeds.

original: de rnams kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are the nature of pleasure and pain.

original: srog rlung nyid ces bya ba ni srog gi rlung dang bcas pa las kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid do ;
analyzed: srog rlung nyid ces bya ba ni srog gi rlung dang bcas pa las kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid do ;
translated: The nature of the life-force wind is the nature of karma.

original: / rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: / rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
translated: Always means at all times.

original: yang dag 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is said that one goes to the right place, which means that one experiences.

original: de ltar bar ma do'i srid pa'i rnam par shes pa 'jug pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bar ma do'i srid pa'i rnam par shes pa 'jug pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, the entry of the consciousness of the intermediate state existence has been explained.

original: da ni sems can gyi khams bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir de'i yan @191a * //
analyzed: da ni sems can gyi khams bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir de'i yan @191a * //
translated: Now, in order to explain the generation of the element of sentient beings, the limbs of that are described.

original: lag zla ba dang po'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lag zla ba dang po'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to describe the state of the first month,

original: nya'i rnam pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: nya'i rnam pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said to be like the shape of a fish.

original: lta ba gzhan pa'i grub mtha' brjod par 'dod nas 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: lta ba gzhan pa'i grub mtha' brjod par 'dod nas 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: Desiring to describe the tenets of other views, this is said.

original: gang gi phyir de rnams kyis 'dod pa la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid gcig pa nyid la gnas skabs bcu brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de rnams kyis 'dod pa la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid gcig pa nyid la gnas skabs bcu brjod pa yin te /
translated: Because they describe the ten states of the one who is of the nature of various forms in the desire realm.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:🔽Fish, tortoise, pig, lion, dwarf,

original: nya dang rus sbal phag pa dang // mi yi seng ge mi'u thung dang // ra ma gnyis dang nag pa dang // sangs rgyas skal gyi zhes pa bcu //
analyzed: nya dang rus sbal phag pa dang // mi yi seng ge mi'u thung dang // ra ma gnyis dang nag pa dang // sangs rgyas skal gyi zhes pa bcu //
translated: two goats, black, and buddha-like, are the ten.

original: zhes bya ba ste //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: 'di'i 'dod pas nya'i rnam pa lta bur zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di'i 'dod pas nya'i rnam pa lta bur zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Here, like the form of a fish is stated.

original: pha ma dag gi khu ba khrag gi theg les mnan pa gang gi tshe bar mdo'i srid pa de'i tshe zla ba dang po la mer mer po dang nur nur po'i gnas skabs grub pas nya'i rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ba ni thog ma'i gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: pha ma dag gi khu ba khrag gi theg les mnan pa gang gi tshe bar mdo'i srid pa de'i tshe zla ba dang po la mer mer po dang nur nur po'i gnas skabs grub pas nya'i rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ba ni thog ma'i gnas skabs la'o //
translated: When the intermediate existence is pressed down by the power of the parents' semen and blood, at that time, in the first month, the state of the kalala and arbuda is established, so it becomes like the form of a fish, in the initial state.

original: 'pho ba'i dus su ni zhes bya ba ni nyi ma khyim dang por 'pho ba'i gnas skabs ltar ro //
analyzed: 'pho ba'i dus su ni zhes bya ba ni nyi ma khyim dang por 'pho ba'i gnas skabs ltar ro //
translated: At the time of transference, it is like the state of the sun transiting the first house.

original: spyod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i gnas skabs rnams so //
analyzed: spyod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i gnas skabs rnams so //
translated: The so-called “conduct” is the states of that [embryo].

original: gang gi phyi rol du nyi ma la lo gcig gi nang du zla ba bcu gnyis la khyim bcu gnyis la longs spyod pa zla ba re re la mthong ba de bzhin du nang gi dus la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyi rol du nyi ma la lo gcig gi nang du zla ba bcu gnyis la khyim bcu gnyis la longs spyod pa zla ba re re la mthong ba de bzhin du nang gi dus la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as externally, in one year, in twelve months, the sun enjoys the twelve houses, seen in each month, so also internally, in the time of the embryo, it is said.

original: de ltar dang po'i gnas skabs bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dang po'i gnas skabs bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the first state,

original: da ni gnyis pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir 'pho ba gnyis pa'i dus su zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni gnyis pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir 'pho ba gnyis pa'i dus su zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: now, in order to describe the second state, he says, “In the time of the second transition,”

original: zla ba gnyis pa la zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis pa la zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: meaning in the second month.

original: slar yang khrag dang 'dres nas ni //
analyzed: slar yang khrag dang 'dres nas ni //
translated: Again, mixed with blood,

original: zhes bya ba ni ma'i rang byung gis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma'i rang byung gis bsdus pa'o //
translated: it is included in the mother’s natural elements.

original: slar yang srog ces bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
analyzed: slar yang srog ces bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
translated: Again, the “life” is the life-force wind.

original: dbye ba gnyis su 'gro zhes bya ba ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gro ste /
analyzed: dbye ba gnyis su 'gro zhes bya ba ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gro ste /
translated: It goes to the two divisions means it goes to the two divisions.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / steng dang 'og gi dbye ba yis //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / de'i phyir / steng dang 'og gi dbye ba yis //
translated: How is that?🔽Therefore, he says, “By the division of above and below,”

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: meaning

original: snying gi steng 'og gi dbye bas so //
analyzed: snying gi steng 'og gi dbye bas so //
translated: above and below the heart.

original: thur sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong las //
analyzed: thur sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong las //
translated: From the going and coming of the downward-voiding wind,

original: zhes bya ba ni thur sel gyi mtshan nyid can gyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thur sel gyi mtshan nyid can gyi rlung ngo //
translated: the downward-voiding wind has the characteristic of the downward-voiding wind.

original: 'gro 'ong las zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'brel pa las so //
analyzed: 'gro 'ong las zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'brel pa las so //
translated: From the going and coming means from the special connection.

original: rus sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: rus sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: It becomes the tortoise-holder.

original: zhes bya ba ni rus sbal lta bu'i dbyibs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rus sbal lta bu'i dbyibs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that it takes on the shape of a tortoise.

original: de ltar gnyis pa'i gnas skabs bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnyis pa'i gnas skabs bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the second stage,

original: da ni gsum pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gsum pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to describe the third stage,

original: de nas @191b 'pho ba gsum pa la //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas @191b 'pho ba gsum pa la // zhes gsungs te /
translated: he says, Next, in the third transference,🔽in the third month.

original: zla ba gsum pa la'o //
analyzed: zla ba gsum pa la'o //
translated: In the third month.

original: khrag dang khu ba'i gzugs can no //
analyzed: khrag dang khu ba'i gzugs can no //
translated: It has the form of blood and semen.

original: zhes bya ba ni khams gnyis 'phel bar 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khams gnyis 'phel bar 'gyur bas so //
translated: This is because the two constituents increase.

original: thur du sel ba'i rlung zhes bya ba ni thur du 'bab pa'i ngo bo rnams kyis so //
analyzed: thur du sel ba'i rlung zhes bya ba ni thur du 'bab pa'i ngo bo rnams kyis so //
translated: The downward-voiding wind means by those that have the nature of flowing downward.

original: skabs nas zhes bya ba ni de rus sbal gyi rnam pa bskams pa'i gnas skabs sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skabs nas zhes bya ba ni de rus sbal gyi rnam pa bskams pa'i gnas skabs sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: “At that time” means that it is the time when the turtle-shaped [embryo] is formed.

original: mnyam pa'i zhes bya ba ni de'i ming can gyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i zhes bya ba ni de'i ming can gyi rlung ngo //
translated: “The even” is the wind that has that name.

original: rlung ni 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rlung ni 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur pa'o //
translated: “The wind arises” means that it will arise.

original: rim pas zhes bya ba ni thur du sel ba'i rim pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rim pas zhes bya ba ni thur du sel ba'i rim pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “In stages” means in the stages of the downward-clearing [wind].

original: des kyang zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa'i rlung gis so //
analyzed: des kyang zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa'i rlung gis so //
translated: “By that” means by the even wind.

original: steng du bltas nas ni gnas zhes bya ba ni steng du 'jug pa'i gdong can no /
analyzed: steng du bltas nas ni gnas zhes bya ba ni steng du 'jug pa'i gdong can no /
translated: “Looking upward, it abides” means that it has a face that moves upward.

original: phag rgod ces bya ba ni phag rgod kyi dbyibs can no //
analyzed: phag rgod ces bya ba ni phag rgod kyi dbyibs can no //
translated: “The boar” is the shape of a wild boar.

original: der zhes bya ba ni mngal gyi rtsa'i nang du'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni mngal gyi rtsa'i nang du'o //
translated: “There” means inside the womb’s channels.

original: 'dzin par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: “It holds” means that it causes holding.

original: de ltar gnas skabs gsum pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs gsum pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus explained the third stage,

original: da ni bzhi pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir /🔽slar yang 'pho ba bzhi pa la //
analyzed: da ni bzhi pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir / slar yang 'pho ba bzhi pa la //
translated: now, in order to explain the fourth stage,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the text] says, “Again, the fourth movement,”🔽and so on.

original: zla ba bzhi pa la'o //
analyzed: zla ba bzhi pa la'o //
translated: In the fourth month.

original: khrag dang khu bas bsgos pa ni //
analyzed: khrag dang khu bas bsgos pa ni //
translated: It is moistened by blood and semen.

original: zhes bya ba ni slar yang pha dang ma las byung ba ngag gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slar yang pha dang ma las byung ba ngag gis so //
translated: This is the origination from the father and mother again, by means of speech.

original: mnyam du rgyu ba'i rlung 'gyur nas //
analyzed: mnyam du rgyu ba'i rlung 'gyur nas //
translated: When the life-upholding wind changes,

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i ming can gyis bkug pa'o //🔽'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i ming can gyis bkug pa'o // 'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro //
translated: the wind of the same name draws it in.🔽It goes downward, facing downward.

original: zhes bya ba ni steng du gnas pa yongs su dor nas 'og tu kha bltas nas 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni steng du gnas pa yongs su dor nas 'og tu kha bltas nas 'gro ba'o //
translated: Having abandoned the upper position, it goes downward, facing downward.

original: rim pas zhes bya ba ni gong nas gong du yongs su smin pa la brten nas so //
analyzed: rim pas zhes bya ba ni gong nas gong du yongs su smin pa la brten nas so //
translated: In stages means in dependence on the ripening of the upper and lower parts.

original: seng ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni //
analyzed: seng ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni //
translated: It is also like a lion.

original: zhes bya ba ni mi yi seng ge de'i dbyi bas can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi yi seng ge de'i dbyi bas can no //
translated: This is the lion of humans, the one with the mane.

original: mnyam du zhes bya ba ni mnyam du gnas kyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: mnyam du zhes bya ba ni mnyam du gnas kyi rlung ngo //
translated: The same means the same abiding wind.

original: gyen du rgyu zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgya ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: gyen du rgyu zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgya ba'i rlung ngo //
translated: The upward moving means the upward moving wind.

original: rim pas zhes bya ba ni yongs su smin pa la brten nas so //
analyzed: rim pas zhes bya ba ni yongs su smin pa la brten nas so //
translated: In stages means in dependence on the ripening.

original: de ltar gnas skabs bzhi pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs bzhi pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the four stages,🔽now, the four activities are explained.

original: da ni lnga pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni lnga pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to describe the fifth abode,🔽

original: de nas 'pho ba lnga pa la //
analyzed: de nas 'pho ba lnga pa la //
translated: Now, in order to describe the stage of the fifth,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said:🔽Then, in the fifth transformation,

original: zla ba lnga pa la'o //
analyzed: zla ba lnga pa la'o //
translated: in the fifth month.

original: khrag dang khu bas 'phel nas ni //
analyzed: khrag dang khu bas 'phel nas ni //
translated: Having increased through blood and semen,

original: zhes bya ba ni khrag dang khu ba dag gis myos pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khrag dang khu ba dag gis myos pa lta bu'o //
translated: through blood and semen, as if intoxicated.

original: gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gis bkug nas ni //
analyzed: gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gis bkug nas ni //
translated: Having been drawn up by the upward moving wind,

original: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: by another, as if under its power.

original: @192a * // ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: @192a * // ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi'i gnas skabs so //
translated: Name and form is the stage of the four formless aggregates.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid 'gro bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid 'gro bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Form is the essence of form, which has become a being.

original: gzhung la la dag las /🔽mi'u thung gi rnams pas 'gro //
analyzed: gzhung la la dag las / mi'u thung gi rnams pas 'gro //
translated: In some texts,

original: zhes kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: it is said:🔽It goes by the form of a dwarf.

original: de'i phyogs la mi'u thung gi dbyibs nyid do //🔽gyen rgyu'i rlung gis khyab byed spro //
analyzed: de'i phyogs la mi'u thung gi dbyibs nyid do // gyen rgyu'i rlung gis khyab byed spro //
translated: In that case, it is the form of a dwarf.🔽The upward moving wind spreads the pervader.

original: zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gis khyab byed spro bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gis khyab byed spro bar byed pa'o //
translated: The upward moving wind spreads the pervader.

original: gang gis 'gul dang g-yo bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gis 'gul dang g-yo bar 'gyur //
translated: by which there is movement and vibration.

original: zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gang las 'gul ba dang g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gang las 'gul ba dang g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the upward-moving wind from which there is movement and vibration.

original: phung po lnga ni rdzogs pa na //
analyzed: phung po lnga ni rdzogs pa na //
translated: When the five aggregates are complete,

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rlung lnga'i rim pas gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rlung lnga'i rim pas gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: the five aggregates are complete by the sequence of the five winds previously mentioned, which are the nature of form and so forth.

original: gsungs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: Spoken means expressed.

original: de ltar gnas skabs lnga pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs lnga pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the five states,

original: da ni gnas skabs drug pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gnas skabs drug pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the sixth state,🔽it is said:

original: de las slar /
analyzed: de las slar /
translated: From that, again,

original: 'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: in the time of the sixth transmigration,

original: zla ba drug pa la'o //
analyzed: zla ba drug pa la'o //
translated: in the sixth month.🔽The earth element and the two eyes

original: sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang // zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams kyis ni mig gnyis spro bar byed do //
analyzed: sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang // zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams kyis ni mig gnyis spro bar byed do //
translated: the earth element causes the two eyes to expand.🔽The pervading

original: khyab byed ces bya ba ni khyab byed kyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: khyab byed ces bya ba ni khyab byed kyi rlung ngo //
translated: is the pervading wind.

original: rlung gis rlung spro zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rnam pa mig gi dbang po la brten pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gis rlung spro zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rnam pa mig gi dbang po la brten pa'o //
translated: “The wind that expands the wind” is the aspect of upward movement, which is based on the eye faculty.

original: spro ba zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: spro ba zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: “Expansion” means generation.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de'i phyir dngos po 'phel ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po 'phel ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said “the expansion of the entity.”

original: dngos po ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
analyzed: dngos po ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
translated: The entity is the object of form, etc.

original: 'phel bar byed pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'phel bar byed pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Expansion is the increase of pride.

original: de ltar gnas skabs drug pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs drug pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the six states,

original: da ni gnas skabs bdun pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /🔽de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la //
analyzed: da ni gnas skabs bdun pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir / de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la //
translated: now, in order to explain the seventh state,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “Then, in the seventh migration,

original: zla ba bdun pa la'o //
analyzed: zla ba bdun pa la'o //
translated: in the seventh month,🔽the water element and the wind called ‘the expanding nāga’ expand.”

original: chu'i khams dang zhes bya ba ni lus sar pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dang zhes bya ba ni lus sar pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: The water element is located in the new body.

original: klu zhes bya ba'i rlung spro bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni rus sbal skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: klu zhes bya ba'i rlung spro bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni rus sbal skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The wind called “the expanding nāga” generates the tortoise.

original: chu'i khams ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: chu'i khams ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is the water element?

original: de'i phyir rna bug dong ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rna bug dong ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the cavity of the ear.”

original: rna ba'i sgo nas sgra rig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i sgo nas sgra rig par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the awareness of sound through the ear.

original: rus sbal ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rus sbal ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the tortoise?

original: de'i phyir gnyis su med par spyod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis su med par spyod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “one should practice non-dually.”

original: bdag dang lhan cig tu gnyis su med par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bdag dang lhan cig tu gnyis su med par spyod pa'o //
translated: One should practice non-dually with the self.

original: de ltar gnas skabs bdun pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs bdun pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the seventh stage,

original: da ni brgyad @192b pa'i gnas skabs brjod par bya ba'i phyir /🔽de nas 'pho ba brgyad pa la //
analyzed: da ni brgyad @192b pa'i gnas skabs brjod par bya ba'i phyir / de nas 'pho ba brgyad pa la //
translated: now, in order to explain the eighth stage,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “Then, in the eighth transmigration,

original: zla ba brgyad pa la'o //
analyzed: zla ba brgyad pa la'o //
translated: in the eighth month,🔽the fire element of the new body

original: me dang zhes bya ba ni lus sar pa la gnas pa'i me'i khams so //
analyzed: me dang zhes bya ba ni lus sar pa la gnas pa'i me'i khams so //
translated: is the fire.

original: sna'i bu ga rig byed ces bya ba ni sna'i sgo nas dri rig pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i bu ga rig byed ces bya ba ni sna'i sgo nas dri rig pa'o //
translated: The awareness of smell through the nose is the nose.

original: rtsangs rlung zhes bya ba ni mnyam gnas kyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: rtsangs rlung zhes bya ba ni mnyam gnas kyi rlung ngo //
translated: The samāna wind is the lizard.

original: rus sbal rlung gis zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i rlung gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rus sbal rlung gis zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i rlung gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The kūrma wind is the tortoise.

original: rang gis rang bzhin shes par byed //
analyzed: rang gis rang bzhin shes par byed //
translated: One should make one’s nature known.”

original: ces bya ba ni rang gis rang bzhin dri'i mtshan nyid shes par byed pa ni rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rang gis rang bzhin dri'i mtshan nyid shes par byed pa ni rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The self-nature is the characteristic of the question. The self-knowing is the understanding.

original: rus sbal rlung gis spro bar byed//
analyzed: rus sbal rlung gis spro bar byed//
translated: The wind of the tortoise is the one that causes the movement.

original: ces bya ba ni rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
translated: This is the wind of movement.

original: de ltar gnas skabs brgyad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs brgyad pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the eight states,

original: da ni gnas skabs dgu pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gnas skabs dgu pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to state the ninth state,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, Then, etc.

original: 'pho ba dgu pa la zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'pho ba dgu pa la zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the ninth transition, etc.

original: rim pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su smin pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su smin pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The stage is the stage of maturity.

original: rlung gi khams kyi ro gang de rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi ro gang de rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The taste of the wind element is the one that causes understanding.

original: lha sbyin zhes bya ba ni rab tu rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: lha sbyin zhes bya ba ni rab tu rgyu ba'o //
translated: The Devadatta is the one that moves.

original: rlung zhes bya ba ni rlung ste /
analyzed: rlung zhes bya ba ni rlung ste /
translated: The wind is the wind.

original: rtsangs rlung spro zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: rtsangs rlung spro zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with the tortoise wind moves.

original: rlung chen pos zhes bya ba ni sna'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig pa'o //
analyzed: rlung chen pos zhes bya ba ni sna'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig pa'o //
translated: The great wind is the one that is together with the nose consciousness.

original: kun 'gro zhes bya ba ni dri'i bye brag thams cad kyis rnam par yongs su spyod pa'o ;
analyzed: kun 'gro zhes bya ba ni dri'i bye brag thams cad kyis rnam par yongs su spyod pa'o ;
translated: Universal means that it is experienced by all the different smells.

original: / de ltar gnas skabs dgu pa bstan nas /
analyzed: / de ltar gnas skabs dgu pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the ninth stage,

original: da ni gnas skabs bcu pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gnas skabs bcu pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to describe the tenth stage,🔽he says,

original: dgu'i dbus gnas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dgu'i dbus gnas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In the middle of the nine, and so on.

original: de rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la //
analyzed: de rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la //
translated: After that, the tenth transmigration

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba bcu pa la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba bcu pa la'o //
translated: means in the tenth month.

original: sngar bstan pa'i phung po lnga'i rlung gi steng du klu la sogs pa dbang po bzhi'i rten rlung bzhi'i grangs kyis dgur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i phung po lnga'i rlung gi steng du klu la sogs pa dbang po bzhi'i rten rlung bzhi'i grangs kyis dgur 'gyur ro //
translated: In addition to the five aggregates taught earlier, there are nine by the count of the four winds that are the supports of the four sense faculties, such as the nāga.

original: de rnams kyi dbus su son pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbus su son pa'o //
translated: In the middle of those🔽means in the middle of those nine.

original: khams zhes bya ba ni rlung gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: khams zhes bya ba ni rlung gi rnam pa'o //
translated: Constituent means the form of the wind.

original: phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can //
translated: Subtle and unimpeded

original: zhes bya ba ni so so skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyis thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni so so skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyis thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: means that it is unimpeded because it is not the domain of ordinary beings.

original: rtsa dang zhes bya ba ni lus su gtogs pa'i rtsa'i nang du'o //
analyzed: rtsa dang zhes bya ba ni lus su gtogs pa'i rtsa'i nang du'o //
translated: In the nāḍīs means within the nāḍīs that belong to the body.

original: sgo ni dgu po rgyas par byed //
analyzed: sgo ni dgu po rgyas par byed //
translated: The doors are the nine openings.

original: ces bya ba ni rgyus pa rnams ni lus kyi nang du gtogs pa'i lus kyi sgo dgu po rgyas par byed pa ni /🔽sang par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rgyus pa rnams ni lus kyi nang du gtogs pa'i lus kyi sgo dgu po rgyas par byed pa ni / sang par byed pa'o //
translated: The channels are the doors of the body, the nine openings of the body.🔽They are the expanders because they expand the body.

original: lus kyi sgo ni tshor ba dang zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dbang po sad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi sgo ni tshor ba dang zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dbang po sad par byed pa'o //
translated: The doors of the body are the sensations.

original: mchog @193a * //
analyzed: mchog @193a * //
translated: The supreme

original: gi zhes bya ba ni mchog nyid du byas nas so //
analyzed: gi zhes bya ba ni mchog nyid du byas nas so //
translated: means that they are made supreme.🔽They are the single

original: gcig tu reg bya'i mtshan nyid 'dzin //
analyzed: gcig tu reg bya'i mtshan nyid 'dzin //
translated: graspers of the characteristics of tactile objects.

original: zhes bya ba ni reg bya 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni reg bya 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: They are the forms that grasp tactile objects.🔽The

original: nor rgyal zhes bya ba ni nges par rgyu ba'i ngo bo'o //🔽rlung zhes bya ba ni rlung ngo //
analyzed: nor rgyal zhes bya ba ni nges par rgyu ba'i ngo bo'o // rlung zhes bya ba ni rlung ngo //
translated: lord of wealth is the nature of the definite mover.🔽The🔽wind is the wind.🔽The wind is the characteristic of the

original: rlung kun sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: rlung kun sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can //
translated: gathering of the winds.🔽It is the nature of the gathering of the

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams sdud pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams sdud pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: winds.🔽The complete awakener is the nature of arising from the

original: rab sad ces bya ba ni rim pas dbang po'i lam nas 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: rab sad ces bya ba ni rim pas dbang po'i lam nas 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: path of the sense organ in stages.

original: mchog gi nam mkha' la zhes bya ba ni don dam par stong pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: mchog gi nam mkha' la zhes bya ba ni don dam par stong pa nyid kyis so //
translated: The supreme space is the ultimate, emptiness.

original: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni de nyid la'o //
analyzed: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni de nyid la'o //
translated: The true abode is that very [emptiness].

original: 'od gsal bzang po'i zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal bzang po'i zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The good clear light is the form of the very clear light.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bcus sems can gyi khams bskyed pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bcus sems can gyi khams bskyed pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the generation of the element of sentient beings with ten topics,

original: da ni sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to express the nature of the emanation body,

original: shes pa bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: shes pa bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the ten knowledges, and so on.

original: sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /
translated: The knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of origination, the knowledge of cessation, the knowledge of the path, the knowledge of extinction, the knowledge of non-arising, the knowledge of phenomena, the knowledge of subsequent [realization],

original: yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / yongs su dris pa shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / yongs su dris pa shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the knowledge of perfect awareness, and the knowledge of complete inquiry.

original: sangs pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni lam bsgoms pa'i sgo nas gti mug gi sgrib pa bzlog pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni lam bsgoms pa'i sgo nas gti mug gi sgrib pa bzlog pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The purified refers to those who have eliminated the obscurations of delusion through the cultivation of the path.

original: de lta bu nyid ces bya ba ni de ma thag par bstan pa'i zla ba bcu po sems kyi khams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid ces bya ba ni de ma thag par bstan pa'i zla ba bcu po sems kyi khams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: The suchness refers to the ten months that were just mentioned, which serve as the cause for the generation of the element of mind.

original: bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: The should be explained refers to what should be expressed.

original: sa bcu zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa bcu zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ten stages refers to the Joyous and so forth.

original: 'pho ba bcu ni zhes bya ba ni sprul pa la rnam pa bcu'i gnas skabs skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'pho ba bcu ni zhes bya ba ni sprul pa la rnam pa bcu'i gnas skabs skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The ten transferences refers to the generation of the ten aspects of the state of emanation.

original: rnam par shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: The consciousness refers to what is to be known.

original: bcu zhes bya ba ni grangs kyis so //
analyzed: bcu zhes bya ba ni grangs kyis so //
translated: The ten refers to the enumeration.

original: rigs pa yis ni zhes bya ba ni gong nas gong du ye shes 'phel ba'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: rigs pa yis ni zhes bya ba ni gong nas gong du ye shes 'phel ba'i sbyor bas so //
translated: The reasoning refers to the application of the increase of wisdom from the previous stage.

original: ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin //🔽ces bya ba ni skyed par mdzad ma ste /
analyzed: ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin // ces bya ba ni skyed par mdzad ma ste /
translated: The mother refers to the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par rtog pa 'joms par byed pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa 'joms par byed pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The producer refers to the aspect that destroys conceptualization.

original: chen por zhes bya ba ni chen po nyid do //
analyzed: chen por zhes bya ba ni chen po nyid do //
translated: “Great” is the state of greatness.

original: brjod ces bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: brjod ces bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: “Said” means spoke.

original: byis pa zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par skyes pa'o //
analyzed: byis pa zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par skyes pa'o //
translated: “Child” means one who has just been born.

original: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽thams cad @193b mkhyen zhing zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'am /
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro // thams cad @193b mkhyen zhing zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'am /
translated: “Perfect Buddha” means one who is free from conceptualization.

original: sngon po dang ser po'i rnam pa yongs su shes pas so //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po'i rnam pa yongs su shes pas so //
translated: “Omniscient” means one who knows by nature or who knows the aspects of blue and yellow.

original: thams cad gzigs zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad dbang po drug gis mthong bas so //
analyzed: thams cad gzigs zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad dbang po drug gis mthong bas so //
translated: “All-seeing” means one who sees all things with the six sense faculties.

original: mgo'i skra ni bregs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis ni dge slong la tshur shog mi dgos pa'o //
analyzed: mgo'i skra ni bregs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis ni dge slong la tshur shog mi dgos pa'o //
translated: “Shaved head” means that by nature one does not need to be told to come as a monk.

original: phru ma'i chos gos yongs su bgos //🔽zhes bya ba ni mi mnyam pa'i dus su 'byung bar 'gyur bas //
analyzed: phru ma'i chos gos yongs su bgos // zhes bya ba ni mi mnyam pa'i dus su 'byung bar 'gyur bas //
translated: “Dressed in a patchwork robe”

original: phru ma'i ming gis dmar po yongs su bgos pa'o //
analyzed: phru ma'i ming gis dmar po yongs su bgos pa'o //
translated: means that one is dressed in red under the name of patchwork because it will arise at an unequal time.

original: thal mo sbyor zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis de lta bu'i dbyibs su 'dug par gyur pa'o//
analyzed: thal mo sbyor zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis de lta bu'i dbyibs su 'dug par gyur pa'o//
translated: The joined palms are the natural shape of the hands.

original: dpal dang ldan pas zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: dpal dang ldan pas zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The glorious are those who have splendor,

original: rang dang 'os pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang dang 'os pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are accomplished by the power of their own appropriate accumulations of merit and knowledge.

original: sa la zhes bya ba ni sa nyid la'o //
analyzed: sa la zhes bya ba ni sa nyid la'o //
translated: The earth is the ground itself.

original: gtugs pa'i phyag ces bya ba ni de lta bu'i rnam pa nyid kyis phyir 'byung ba'i phyir ro ;🔽/ mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dzin //
analyzed: gtugs pa'i phyag ces bya ba ni de lta bu'i rnam pa nyid kyis phyir 'byung ba'i phyir ro ; / mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dzin //
translated: The prostration is the act of bowing down, because it is the act of going toward that.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang dang 'os pa'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang dang 'os pa'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pas so //
translated: The thirty-two marks are the marks appropriate to oneself.

original: rab sad byed ces bya ba ni dus rin po nyid du lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo bsgoms pas rab tu sad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab sad byed ces bya ba ni dus rin po nyid du lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo bsgoms pas rab tu sad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The awakening is the act of awakening, because one awakens through the meditation on the essence of co-emergence at the appropriate time.

original: ye shes chen po thob pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dngos po la rang gi mtshan nyid snang bas kyang gcig tu stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes chen po thob pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dngos po la rang gi mtshan nyid snang bas kyang gcig tu stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: The attainment of great intuition is the thorough knowledge of emptiness, not as a mere negation, but as the appearance of the intrinsic identity of things.

original: 'du byed las ni grol ba dang / zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'du byed pa las grol ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du byed las ni grol ba dang / zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'du byed pa las grol ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Liberation from the formative forces is the liberation from the formative forces of virtue and nonvirtue.

original: rnam rtog med ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog med ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: Nonconceptual is nonimagination.

original: dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pas mi 'jigs pa ste /
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pas mi 'jigs pa ste /
translated: The great hero is fearless in the face of the afflictions.

original: phra mo'i spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phra mo'i spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is free from subtle activity.

original: skyed byed sha ni 'jigs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis sha chen 'jib pas dam tshig la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: skyed byed sha ni 'jigs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis sha chen 'jib pas dam tshig la gnas pa'o //
translated: The flesh-devouring fear is the observance of the pledge by the natural consumption of great flesh.

original: bdud rtsi lnga ni zhes bya ba ni mngal gyi rtsa'i nang du gnas par byed pa nyid kyis bdud rtsi lnga po myong bar byed cing de la rtse gcig pas so //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga ni zhes bya ba ni mngal gyi rtsa'i nang du gnas par byed pa nyid kyis bdud rtsi lnga po myong bar byed cing de la rtse gcig pas so //
translated: The five ambrosias are the five ambrosias that are experienced by the single-pointed focus on the five ambrosias that are located within the channels of the womb.

original: seng ge bzhin du spyod ces bya ba ni the tshom med pas so //
analyzed: seng ge bzhin du spyod ces bya ba ni the tshom med pas so //
translated: The phrase acts like a lion means that one should be free of doubt.

original: spyod ces bya ba ni gnas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: spyod ces bya ba ni gnas par byed pa'o //
translated: The word acts means that one should be free of doubt.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la sgom pa po'o //🔽rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs //🔽zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs ma lus pa @194a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la sgom pa po'o // rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs // zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs ma lus pa @194a * //
translated: The word yoga means that one should be free of doubt.🔽The phrase having abandoned all concepts means that one should be free of doubt.🔽The phrase having abandoned all concepts means that one should be free of doubt.

original: dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dang bral ba'o //
translated: The phrase having abandoned all concepts means that one should be free of doubt.

original: de ltar de nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the emanation body of reality itself,

original: da ni nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo bstan nas sba bar bya ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo bstan nas sba bar bya ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the door of summary and to explain the secret,

original: 'di nyid mchog tu gsang ba ste //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di nyid mchog tu gsang ba ste // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, this is the supreme secret.

original: de ma thag par bstan pa rnams te /
analyzed: de ma thag par bstan pa rnams te /
translated: The supreme secret is the teaching just explained.

original: snod ma yin pa rnams la sba bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: snod ma yin pa rnams la sba bar bya ba'o //
translated: It should be kept secret from those who are not suitable vessels.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa la mos pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa la mos pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The word supreme means that it is the essence of the special result, because it is the special object of faith.

original: gang du yang ni ma gsungs so //
analyzed: gang du yang ni ma gsungs so //
translated: It has not been taught anywhere else.

original: zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams la snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la mi bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams la snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la mi bstan pa'o //
translated: This means that the Action Tantra and so forth should not be taught to sentient beings who are not fit vessels.

original: rlung skyed pa yi nges pa ni //
analyzed: rlung skyed pa yi nges pa ni //
translated: The certainty of the generation of the winds

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba bcu pa'i rim pas rlung bcu skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba bcu pa'i rim pas rlung bcu skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This means the characteristic of generating the ten winds by the process of the ten months.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: Knowledge means to be known.

original: bla ma brgyud pa las zhes bya ba ni rgyud du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal las so //
analyzed: bla ma brgyud pa las zhes bya ba ni rgyud du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal las so //
translated: From the lineage of the guru means from the mouth of the vajra master who is endowed with the characteristics taught in the tantras and is authentic.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The commentary on the glorious Vajra Garland, a great yoga tantra,

original: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: is composed by the paṇḍita Alaṃkakalaśa.

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the thirty-second chapter of the treatise that elucidates the very profound meaning.

original: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pas rlung rnams skyed pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan gdab pa bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pas rlung rnams skyed pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan gdab pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus explained the reply to the question about the place of origin of the winds in the thirty-second chapter,

original: da ni de rnams nyid kyi nub pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de rnams nyid kyi nub pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the reply to the question about the place of their setting,

original: le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa nye bar dgod cing dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa nye bar dgod cing dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa ni /
translated: the thirty-third chapter is introduced.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis po'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis po'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the thirty-second chapter.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Also means as before.

original: rlung rnams zhes bya ba ni bcu'o //
analyzed: rlung rnams zhes bya ba ni bcu'o //
translated: The winds are the ten.

original: nub pa ni 'jig pa ste bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: nub pa ni 'jig pa ste bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: Setting is destruction.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pas na mchog go //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pas na mchog go //
translated: Supreme means the best, because of the thorough knowledge of the nature of the abiding state.

original: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba gsung ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba gsung ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said, by which,

original: rlung rnams nub par gyur pas so //
analyzed: rlung rnams nub par gyur pas so //
translated: by the setting of the winds.

original: yongs su shes pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By the mere thorough knowledge,

original: zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis shes pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis shes pa tsam gyis so //
translated: By the process of hearing, etc.

original: 'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristic of the moment of death

original: zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas yongs su shes pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas yongs su shes pas so //
translated: By the thorough knowledge of the signs of death.🔽Correctly

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: By the nature of non-error.

original: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the undertaking,

original: da ni dngos @194b su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dngos @194b su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the actual content,

original: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo bshad pa ni /
translated: he explains the nature of its branches.🔽Mutually

original: phan tshun du ni zhes bya ba ni phan tshun no //
analyzed: phan tshun du ni zhes bya ba ni phan tshun no //
translated: By mutual.

original: yang dag sdud ces bya ba ni nye bar sdud pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag sdud ces bya ba ni nye bar sdud pa'o //
translated: Correctly collected

original: rim ltar zhes bya ba ni lo dang zla ba dang nyin zhag gi rim pas so //
analyzed: rim ltar zhes bya ba ni lo dang zla ba dang nyin zhag gi rim pas so //
translated: By the process of years, months, and days.🔽Of birth

original: skye ba'i zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams la le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa las bshad pa'i chogs so //
analyzed: skye ba'i zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams la le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa las bshad pa'i chogs so //
translated: Of the winds, by the group explained in the thirty-second chapter.🔽Dissolves

original: thim par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thim par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Is destroyed.🔽Of the winds

original: rlung rnams zhes bya ba ni bcu po rnams kyi phan tshun du'o //
analyzed: rlung rnams zhes bya ba ni bcu po rnams kyi phan tshun du'o //
translated: Of the ten, mutually.

original: 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “Will go” means will be born.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni nges par byas nas so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni nges par byas nas so //
translated: “Truly” means having ascertained.

original: 'char dang nub pa'i nyin mtshan du //🔽zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyi rol du nyi ma 'am /
analyzed: 'char dang nub pa'i nyin mtshan du // zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyi rol du nyi ma 'am /
translated: “Day and night of rising and setting”

original: zla ba 'char ba yod par gyur na slar yang nub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zla ba 'char ba yod par gyur na slar yang nub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du'o //
translated: means just as, externally, when the sun or moon rises, it will set again.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the brief presentation,

original: da ni rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the extensive presentation,

original: de'i yan lag dbang po'i rlung sdud pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag dbang po'i rlung sdud pa bstan pa ni /
translated: the explanation of the branch, the vāyu that gathers the sense organs,🔽is stated.

original: lo bcu lon na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lo bcu lon na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “When ten years have passed” and so on.

original: nang gi dus kyis bsdus pa rnams kyis te /
analyzed: nang gi dus kyis bsdus pa rnams kyis te /
translated: The internal is included in the time;

original: phyi rol gyi lo gcig gi nang du nyin zhag gis bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi lo gcig gi nang du nyin zhag gis bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the external is included in the year and the day.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i lo bcus so //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i lo bcus so //
translated: In that way, ten years have passed.

original: thog mar 'gro zhes bya ba ni dang po nyid du 'gro ba ni 'das pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: thog mar 'gro zhes bya ba ni dang po nyid du 'gro ba ni 'das pa rnams kyis so //
translated: “First going” means that the first is the past.

original: nor las rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni nges par rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: nor las rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni nges par rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The one called “victorious over wealth” has the characteristic of definite movement.

original: rgyags las myos pa'i zhes bya ba ni khrag dang sha 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyags las myos pa'i zhes bya ba ni khrag dang sha 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: “ Intoxicated by arrogance” means that it is the cause of the increase of blood and flesh.

original: zos te zhes bya ba ni rang gis bya ba byed mi nus pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zos te zhes bya ba ni rang gis bya ba byed mi nus pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: “ Having eaten” means that it accomplishes what cannot be done by itself.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir skyes na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir skyes na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “when born. ”

original: de'i nus pa 'joms pa la nus zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i nus pa 'joms pa la nus zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it destroys its power.

original: rgyags las myos pa yang gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyags las myos pa yang gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: Arrogance is not different from that.

original: thur sel gyi rlung zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thur sel gyi rlung zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the downward-voiding wind.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽de'i phyir sgra gcan zla ba bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / de'i phyir sgra gcan zla ba bzhin //
translated: How is that?

original: zhes bya ba gsung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsung ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “like Rāhu swallowing the moon. ”

original: ji ltar phyi rol du zla ba sgra gcan gyis za ba de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar phyi rol du zla ba sgra gcan gyis za ba de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is like the external moon being swallowed by Rāhu.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes su'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes su'o //
translated: “ Then” means after that.
