original: gzhan gyi lo bcur zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lo bcur zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis so //
translated: “ Ten years of others” means of those.

original: phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'o //
analyzed: phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'o //
translated: “Gone” means past.

original: rgyags chu rlung ni yang dag skye //
analyzed: rgyags chu rlung ni yang dag skye //
translated: The wind of the water of intoxication arises.

original: zhes bya ba ni khu ba dang tshil 'phel bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khu ba dang tshil 'phel bar byed pa ste /
translated: This is the increase of semen and fat.

original: mnyam gnas kyi ming gi rnam grags so //
analyzed: mnyam gnas kyi ming gi rnam grags so //
translated: This is the fame of the name of the life-sustaining wind.

original: lha sbyin zhes bya ba'i @195a * //
analyzed: lha sbyin zhes bya ba'i @195a * //
translated: The wind called “god-given”

original: rlung ni za zhes bya ba ni rab tu rgyu ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rlung ni za zhes bya ba ni rab tu rgyu ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: is the essence of movement.

original: rlung ni rlung ngo //
analyzed: rlung ni rlung ngo //
translated: The wind is the wind.

original: snga ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni rgyags pas myos pa na nor las rgyal sdud pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni rgyags pas myos pa na nor las rgyal sdud pa bzhin du'o //
translated: “As before” means like the increase of wealth when intoxicated by intoxication.

original: rim pa zhes bya ba ni lo bcu'i rim pas so //
analyzed: rim pa zhes bya ba ni lo bcu'i rim pas so //
translated: “In order” means in the order of ten years.

original: gzhan yang lo bcur phyin pa ni zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang lo bcur phyin pa ni zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: Moreover, “gone for ten years” is as before.

original: rgyags pa'i chu rlung skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i chu rlung skye bar 'gyur //
translated: The wind of the water of intoxication arises.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the future.

original: me dang rlung 'phel bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: me dang rlung 'phel bar byed pa ste /
translated: It increases fire and wind.

original: gyen du rgyu ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gyen du rgyu ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: It is the form of upward movement.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /🔽de'i phyir rtsangs pa zhes bya ba'i //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir rtsangs pa zhes bya ba'i //
translated: What is it like?🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: “Like a lizard.”

original: kun nas 'bab pa ni ming can no //
analyzed: kun nas 'bab pa ni ming can no //
translated: The all-pervading is the one with the name.

original: za zhes bya ba ni rang gi don byed pa la nus pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: za zhes bya ba ni rang gi don byed pa la nus pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: The eater is the one that destroys the power of the one who does its own work.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
translated: Then means after that.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni lo rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni lo rnams kyis so //
translated: Again means the years.

original: lo bcur phyin ces bya ba ni son pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: lo bcur phyin ces bya ba ni son pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Having reached ten years means having arrived.

original: yang dag skyes pa'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: yang dag skyes pa'i rim pa yis //
translated: By the process of perfect birth,

original: btang bzung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
analyzed: btang bzung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
translated: the one called Rāhu is the life-force wind.

original: rlung ni chen po yis zhes bya ba ni rlung thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas so //
analyzed: rlung ni chen po yis zhes bya ba ni rlung thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas so //
translated: The great wind is the chief of all winds.

original: rus sbal rlung ni za bar byed //
analyzed: rus sbal rlung ni za bar byed //
translated: The tortoise wind eats.

original: ces bya ba ni rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung la nus pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung la nus pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: This means it destroys the power of the moving wind.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rus sbal gyi rlung btang bzung gis zos pa'i rjes la'o //🔽klu'i zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rus sbal gyi rlung btang bzung gis zos pa'i rjes la'o // klu'i zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
translated: Then means after the tortoise wind has eaten Rāhu.🔽 The nāga is the upward-moving wind.

original: btang bzung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
analyzed: btang bzung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
translated: Rāhu is the life-force wind.

original: stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because their power and splendor are equal.

original: zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa ni 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa ni 'dra ba'o //
translated: Equality means similarity.

original: rlung gi bya ba byed pa la stobs ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi bya ba byed pa la stobs ni nus pa'o //
translated: Power is the ability to perform the function of wind.

original: gzi brjid ni rang dang 'os pa'i nus pa byed pa'i mtshan nyid gang la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid ni rang dang 'os pa'i nus pa byed pa'i mtshan nyid gang la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Splendor is the characteristic of the ability to perform one’s own function.

original: dus gzhan lo bcur phyin pa na //
analyzed: dus gzhan lo bcur phyin pa na //
translated: After ten years have passed,

original: zhes bya ba ni lo bcu'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lo bcu'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'o //
translated: means after the end of ten years.

original: gang gis kyang zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga'i nang nas gcig gis so //
analyzed: gang gis kyang zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga'i nang nas gcig gis so //
translated: By anyone means by either of the two.

original: gang la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du btang bzung ngam klu la'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du btang bzung ngam klu la'o //
translated: To whom means to the Garuḍa or the nāga, as before.

original: gnod par byed pa ni nus te zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa ni nus te zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: Capable of harming is connected to this.

original: phan tshun du sdud par byed pa'i rnam pas 'ching bar byed mi nus so //
analyzed: phan tshun du sdud par byed pa'i rnam pas 'ching bar byed mi nus so //
translated: They are not capable of binding each other by the mode of mutual attraction.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / de'i phyir / stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: Why is that?

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it says,

original: stobs dang nus pa dag mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs dang nus pa dag mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because their power and ability are equal.🔽Because their power and ability are equal.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni lo bcus so //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni lo bcus so //
translated: “Otherwise” means in ten years.

original: phyin pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'o //
analyzed: phyin pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'o //
translated: “Having passed” means having gone by.

original: btang bzung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
analyzed: btang bzung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
translated: “Grasping” means the life-force wind.

original: stobs @195b chen thabs zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi las kyi stobs shin tu chen po klu'i rlung gis nye bar sdud pa la nus pa thob nas so //
analyzed: stobs @195b chen thabs zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi las kyi stobs shin tu chen po klu'i rlung gis nye bar sdud pa la nus pa thob nas so //
translated: “Great power” means having attained the ability to gather in the nāga wind through the great power of previous karma.

original: klu'i zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: klu'i zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gi rang bzhin no //
translated: “Nāga” is the nature of the upward-moving wind.

original: za zhes pa ni rang gi bya ba byed pa la nus pa zlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: za zhes pa ni rang gi bya ba byed pa la nus pa zlog par byed pa'o //
translated: “Eating” means reversing the ability to perform one’s function.

original: rim gyis zhes bya ba ni 'grib pa dang shin tu 'grib pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis so //🔽de ltar dbang po'i rlung nye bar bsdu ba bstan nas /
analyzed: rim gyis zhes bya ba ni 'grib pa dang shin tu 'grib pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis so // de ltar dbang po'i rlung nye bar bsdu ba bstan nas /
translated: “Gradually” means through the stages of decrease, very decrease, and so on.🔽Having explained the gathering of the sense organ winds,

original: da ni phung po'i rlung nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni phung po'i rlung nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the gathering of the aggregate winds,

original: de nas gzhan zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: after that, “another” is stated.

original: lo bcus so //
analyzed: lo bcus so //
translated: “In ten years” means in ten years.

original: phyin zhes bya ba ni 'das pas so //
analyzed: phyin zhes bya ba ni 'das pas so //
translated: “Having passed” means having gone by.

original: khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'phel //
translated: Blood and flesh increase.

original: rgyags shing myos pa'i zhes bya ba ni thur sel zhes bya ba'i gzhan gyi ming can no //
analyzed: rgyags shing myos pa'i zhes bya ba ni thur sel zhes bya ba'i gzhan gyi ming can no //
translated: The intoxicated is another name for the downward-voiding wind.

original: btang bzung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung ste /
analyzed: btang bzung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung ste /
translated: The grasping is the life-force wind.

original: za bar byed ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: za bar byed ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is related to devouring.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir mnyam par mnan na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mnyam par mnan na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, when it is pressed down evenly.

original: rang gi bya ba byed pa'i las bkug nas so //
analyzed: rang gi bya ba byed pa'i las bkug nas so //
translated: It is drawn in by the action of performing its own function.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
translated: Then means after that.

original: lo bcu pa phyin pa ni 'das pa'o //
analyzed: lo bcu pa phyin pa ni 'das pa'o //
translated: The ten years are past.

original: btang bzung nyid /
analyzed: btang bzung nyid /
translated: The grasping itself

original: rgyags shing myos pas mnyam par gnas //
analyzed: rgyags shing myos pas mnyam par gnas //
translated: is pressed down evenly by intoxication.

original: zhes bya ba ni ming gzhan can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ming gzhan can no //
translated: This is another name for it.

original: za bar byed ces bya ba ni nye bar sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: za bar byed ces bya ba ni nye bar sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: It is related to devouring, which means to gather.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir thob nas ni zhe bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir thob nas ni zhe bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, having obtained it.

original: snga ma bzhin du mnan nas so //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du mnan nas so //
translated: It is pressed down as before.

original: myos pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: myos pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind of intoxication is it?

original: de'i phyir / khrag dang tshil ni rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: de'i phyir / khrag dang tshil ni rnam par 'phel //
translated: Therefore, it is said, blood and fat increase.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus he has spoken.

original: khrag dang tshil rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: khrag dang tshil rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: It causes blood and fat to increase.

original: rlung chen po zhes bya ba ni rlung thams cad kyi gtso bor byed pa'o //
analyzed: rlung chen po zhes bya ba ni rlung thams cad kyi gtso bor byed pa'o //
translated: The great wind is the chief of all the winds.

original: ci zhig byed cing zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig byed cing zhe na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir rtsa chu rnam par 'phel zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsa chu rnam par 'phel zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it causes the channels and urine to increase.

original: bad kan la sogs 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: bad kan la sogs 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: It has the nature of phlegm and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
translated: Then, after that,

original: bcu pa gzhan phyin pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'das pas so //
analyzed: bcu pa gzhan phyin pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'das pas so //
translated: the tenth is the past.

original: btang bzung nyid ces bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
analyzed: btang bzung nyid ces bya ba ni srog gi rlung ngo //
translated: The one called supreme abandonment is the life-force wind.

original: myos pa'i dus zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ste za bar byed ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: myos pa'i dus zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ste za bar byed ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: The time of intoxication is the upward-moving wind, which is connected with the word “devour”.

original: btang bzung ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: btang bzung ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the supreme abandonment like?

original: de'i phyir stobs rgyal zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir stobs rgyal zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the powerful conqueror.

original: rang gi nus pas nga rgyal dang bcas pa lta bur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi nus pas nga rgyal dang bcas pa lta bur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is like having pride due to one’s own ability.

original: myos pa'i dus ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: myos pa'i dus ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the time of intoxication like?

original: de'i phyir / rlung dang me ni 'phel bar byed //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rlung dang me ni 'phel bar byed //
translated: Therefore,

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /🔽lus la gnas pa'i @196a * //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te / lus la gnas pa'i @196a * //
translated: it is said:

original: rlung dang me 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rlung dang me 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: “wind and fire increase.”🔽The wind and fire that are located in the body🔽increase.

original: rnam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lus la ltas ngan pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lus la ltas ngan pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Transforming” means that it produces bad omens in the body.

original: chen po zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chen po zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Great” means that it stops the life faculty.

original: longs spyod nga rgyal bcas zhes bya ba ni rlung thams cad nye bar bsdu ba'i rnam pas de nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o //🔽de nas lo bcu gzhan lon na //
analyzed: longs spyod nga rgyal bcas zhes bya ba ni rlung thams cad nye bar bsdu ba'i rnam pas de nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o // de nas lo bcu gzhan lon na //
translated: “Enjoyment and pride” means that all the winds are gathered together in the form of pride.

original: zhes bya ba ni los so //🔽rang gi lus rgyas lci bar 'gyur //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni los so // rang gi lus rgyas lci bar 'gyur //
translated: “After another ten years have passed” means that the years have passed.

original: zhes bya ba ni khyab byed kyi rlung 'gro bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khyab byed kyi rlung 'gro bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “One’s body becomes heavy and full” means that the pervading wind moves.

original: g-yo ba med pa ni khyab byed kyi yul lci ba ni nye bar sdud pa brtson pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa ni khyab byed kyi yul lci ba ni nye bar sdud pa brtson pa'o //
translated: “Without movement” means that the object of the pervading wind is heavy.

original: ldog cing zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la ldog par 'dod pas te /
analyzed: ldog cing zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la ldog par 'dod pas te /
translated: “Turning back” means that one wishes to turn back to one’s body.

original: rim gyis 'grib par 'gyur zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: rim gyis 'grib par 'gyur zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with “gradually decreases. ”

original: rnam par shes pa rim gyis 'grib par byed ces bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rim gyis 'grib par byed ces bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that it gradually decreases consciousness.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /🔽de'i phyir chu dang me ni 'dres pas na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na / de'i phyir chu dang me ni 'dres pas na /
translated: What does it do?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Water and fire are mixed. ”

original: lus la gnas pa'i chu la /
analyzed: lus la gnas pa'i chu la /
translated: Water in the body

original: rlung zhes bya ba ni rlung ste de thob nas so //
analyzed: rlung zhes bya ba ni rlung ste de thob nas so //
translated: is obtained by the wind called “wind. ”

original: de nas lo bcu gzhan du phyin //
analyzed: de nas lo bcu gzhan du phyin //
translated: Then, after ten years have passed,

original: ces bya ba ni 'das pa la'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'das pa la'o //
translated: it is said that the wind is reversed.🔽With its roots,

original: rtsa ba dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis so //
analyzed: rtsa ba dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis so //
translated: means in every way.🔽It becomes nonexistent

original: med par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: med par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: means it is destroyed.

original: rang gi lus dor nas bar do'i srid pa 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi lus dor nas bar do'i srid pa 'dzin par byed do //
translated: Having abandoned its own body, it takes up the intermediate existence.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / chu shing 'bras bu ji bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / de'i phyir / chu shing 'bras bu ji bzhin du //
translated: How is that?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Like the fruit of the plantain tree. ”🔽The great one

original: chen po zhes bya ba ni rlung zhes bya ba dang de ni thams cad sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chen po zhes bya ba ni rlung zhes bya ba dang de ni thams cad sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the wind called “wind. ” It is called “great” because it gathers everything together.

original: las kyi rnam smin zad pa yis //
analyzed: las kyi rnam smin zad pa yis //
translated: By the exhaustion of the ripening of karma,

original: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam smin la nye bar longs spyod pa mthar thug pa'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam smin la nye bar longs spyod pa mthar thug pa'i tshe na'o //
translated: at the time of the completion of the enjoyment of the ripening of karma.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis nub pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis nub pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of the setting by two aspects,

original: da ni nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to state the summary,

original: de lta'i rim pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta'i rim pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, “In that way, the sequence,” and so on.

original: de ltar sngar bstan pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: de ltar sngar bstan pa'i rim pas so //
translated: In that way, by the sequence taught previously,

original: zla ba bcu 'am yang na nyi ma bcu ste go sla'o //
analyzed: zla ba bcu 'am yang na nyi ma bcu ste go sla'o //
translated: ten months or ten days, which is easy to understand.

original: cho ni nyung du byas nas zhes bya ba ni tshe thung du rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: cho ni nyung du byas nas zhes bya ba ni tshe thung du rnams kyi'o //
translated: The word “little” is for those of short life.

original: 'chi bar shes par bya zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi bar shes par bya zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: “One should know death” means one should know.

original: srog zad par ni zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbang po 'gag pas so //
analyzed: srog zad par ni zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbang po 'gag pas so //
translated: “By the exhaustion of life” is by the cessation of the life faculty.

original: de ltar de'i nye bar bsdu ba bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i nye bar bsdu ba bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the summary of that,

original: da ni de nyid rgyu gzhan las shes par bya ba brjod pa'i phyir /🔽mkha' 'gro ma bsdus rgyud las ni //
analyzed: da ni de nyid rgyu gzhan las shes par bya ba brjod pa'i phyir / mkha' 'gro ma bsdus rgyud las ni //
translated: now, in order to state the knowledge of that by another cause,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, “In the Condensed Tantra of the Ḍākinī,” and so on.

original: de brjod par @196b byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud las so //
analyzed: de brjod par @196b byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud las so //
translated: The tantra of the yogi is the one who expresses that.

original: shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams nub par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams nub par gyur pa'o //
translated: The to be known is the subsiding of the winds.

original: shin tu rgyas par zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang rgyas pa las so //
analyzed: shin tu rgyas par zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang rgyas pa las so //
translated: The extensive is from the very extensive.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The Extensive Commentary on the Glorious Vajra Garland of the Great Yoga Tantra,

original: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: Composed by the Paṇḍita Alaṃkakalaśa,

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
translated: Called The Illuminator of the Profound Meaning,

original: le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: The Extensive Explanation of the Thirty-Third Chapter.

original: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pas rlung rnams kyi nub pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pas rlung rnams kyi nub pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having expressed the reply to the question about the object of the subsiding of the winds in the thirty-third chapter,

original: da ni bsdu ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi yul la dri ba'i lan gdab pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni bsdu ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi yul la dri ba'i lan gdab pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to express the reply to the question about the object of the yoga of the dakini of the summary,

original: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa nye bar 'god cing dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa nye bar 'god cing dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa ni /
translated: the thirty-fourth chapter is set forth. First, at the beginning, the composition is as follows.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa bstan pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa bstan pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the teaching of the thirty-third chapter.🔽Also, etc.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: as before.

original: bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro'i rnal 'byor bshad //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro'i rnal 'byor bshad //
translated: The yoginis' gathering

original: ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: is explained.

original: ma lus pa'i mkha' 'gro'i rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro ma ste /
analyzed: ma lus pa'i mkha' 'gro'i rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro ma ste /
translated: The yoginis' gathering is the gathering of all the🔽yoginis' concepts.

original: rgyud kyi rim pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rim pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term is the essence of the tantra.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni sbyor ba ste de'o //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni sbyor ba ste de'o //
translated: Its application is the application of that.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir mchog gi ye shes te zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mchog gi ye shes te zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be supreme wisdom.

original: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of the non-apprehension of the form of non-attachment.

original: chen po'i chen po zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid kyis shin tu yang mchog go //
analyzed: chen po'i chen po zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid kyis shin tu yang mchog go //
translated: The great of the great is extremely supreme because it causes the exhaustion of all concepts.

original: snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa //
analyzed: snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa //
translated: The essence of the essence is summarized.

original: zhes bya ba ni snying pos ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying pos ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Thus, essence is the creation stage.

original: snying po'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: snying po'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The essence of the meaning is the form of the completion stage.

original: de ltar de'i rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught its composition,

original: da ni de'i dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de'i dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain its actual meaning,

original: de'i yan lag tu bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag tu bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni /
translated: the definition of the dakinis that are included as its branches is taught.

original: mkha' 'gro rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The dakinis, etc., are stated.

original: d'aki ni nam mkha' la 'gro bas //
analyzed: d'aki ni nam mkha' la 'gro bas //
translated: Dakini means moving in space.

original: sangs rgyas dbyings su rab tu grags //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dbyings su rab tu grags //
translated: It is well known as the buddha expanse.

original: mkha' spyod kun gyi dngos grub ni //
analyzed: mkha' spyod kun gyi dngos grub ni //
translated: The spiritual powers of all the sky-farers

original: mkha' 'gro zhes bya rab tu brjod //🔽ces bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro zhes bya rab tu brjod // ces bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: are well known as dakinis.

original: mkha' 'gro rnams sdud pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i sa bon sdud par byed pa ni mi snang bar byed pas gang de'i phyir bsdus pa'i mkha' @197a * //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro rnams sdud pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i sa bon sdud par byed pa ni mi snang bar byed pas gang de'i phyir bsdus pa'i mkha' @197a * //
translated: Thus, the dakinis are included means that the inclusion of the seed syllables of the five buddhas abiding in the dharmacakra is the cause of invisibility.

original: 'gror brjod de rigs pa'i ngo bo la brjod do //
analyzed: 'gror brjod de rigs pa'i ngo bo la brjod do //
translated: The word “goes” is used in the sense of the nature of reasoning.

original: ji lta bus she na /🔽de'i phyir / lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa //
analyzed: ji lta bus she na / de'i phyir / lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa //
translated: In what way?🔽Therefore, it is said:🔽“Always abiding in the center of the navel”

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽🔽

original: lte ba'i dbus na zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i aa yig shad kyi rnam pa bcom pa'i stobs kyis rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus na zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i aa yig shad kyi rnam pa bcom pa'i stobs kyis rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The center of the navel is the letter A in the form of a vertical line, which is perfected by the power of destruction.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
translated: Always means at all times.

original: nyi ma stong dang mtshungs pa'i 'od //
analyzed: nyi ma stong dang mtshungs pa'i 'od //
translated: The light of a thousand suns

original: ces bya ba ni nyi ma stod dang mtshungs pa'i 'od gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni nyi ma stod dang mtshungs pa'i 'od gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: means that which has the light of a thousand suns is so called.

original: shin tu yang 'bar ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu yang 'bar ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nature of extreme brilliance.

original: ye shes chen po'i me 'byung ba //
analyzed: ye shes chen po'i me 'byung ba //
translated: The fire of great wisdom arises

original: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i me ni ye shes kyi ngo bos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i me ni ye shes kyi ngo bos so //
translated: means that the fire that arises from the union of method and wisdom is the nature of wisdom.

original: 'byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
translated: Arising means being born.

original: kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed //
analyzed: kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed //
translated: It destroys all conceptual thoughts.

original: ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs ma lus pa sdud par byed pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs ma lus pa sdud par byed pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: This is the form that gathers in the entire host of conceptual thoughts.

original: de ltar nges pa'i tshig bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar nges pa'i tshig bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained the verbal roots,

original: da ni bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the action,

original: 'char bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'char bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares “arising,” and so on.

original: 'char bas zhes bya ba ni skyes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'char bas zhes bya ba ni skyes par gyur pa'o //
translated: “ Arising” means having arisen.

original: phung po'i rnam rtog ni zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rnam par rtog pa sangs rgyas lnga'i sa bon gyi bdag nyid can la'o //
analyzed: phung po'i rnam rtog ni zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rnam par rtog pa sangs rgyas lnga'i sa bon gyi bdag nyid can la'o //
translated: “ The conceptual thought of the aggregates” means in regard to the conceptual thought of the five aggregates, which has the nature of the seeds of the five buddhas.

original: bsreg byas zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsreg byas zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: “ Burned” means made invisible.

original: bar chad med pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ Without interruption” means

original: yang dang yang du'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang du'o //
translated: again and again.

original: lus zhes bya ba ni lus so //
analyzed: lus zhes bya ba ni lus so //
translated: “ Body” means the body.

original: de rjes khams kyi rnam rtog ni //
analyzed: de rjes khams kyi rnam rtog ni //
translated: “ Then the conceptual thought of the elements”

original: zhes bya ba ni lha mo bzhi'i sa bon gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lha mo bzhi'i sa bon gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: means in regard to the nature of the seeds of the four goddesses.

original: bsdus nas slar yang zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: bsdus nas slar yang zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: “ Having gathered” means made invisible,

original: snga ma ltar lus nyid do //
analyzed: snga ma ltar lus nyid do //
translated: as before, the body itself.

original: rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba ni dngos po las so //🔽gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba ni dngos po las so // gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni //
translated: “Naturally” means from the thing.🔽The concepts of object and subject

original: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i skabs kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / longs spyod kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i de'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i skabs kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / longs spyod kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i de'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: are the concepts in the situation of the emanation wheel and the concepts in the situation of the enjoyment wheel.

original: yang na gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni /
analyzed: yang na gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni /
translated: Or else, the concepts of object and subject

original: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsa gnyis la sngags dgong pa'i mtshan nyid do ;
analyzed: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsa gnyis la sngags dgong pa'i mtshan nyid do ;
translated: are the characteristics of the mantra placed in the two channels, the left and the right.

original: / rang bzhin de ni slar yang sdud par byed //
analyzed: / rang bzhin de ni slar yang sdud par byed //
translated: “That nature” is again the withdrawal.

original: ces bya ba ni dngos po la mi snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni dngos po la mi snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is the invisibility of the thing.

original: de tsam gyis ni gnyis ka yang bdag med pa'i rnam pa nyid 'di la bstan to //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni gnyis ka yang bdag med pa'i rnam pa nyid 'di la bstan to //
translated: By that much, both are taught to be the aspect of selflessness.

original: phye le bzhin zhes bya ba ni phye ma leb lta bu'o //
analyzed: phye le bzhin zhes bya ba ni phye ma leb lta bu'o //
translated: “Like a butterfly” means like a moth.

original: gang las de ltar zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gang @197b la'o ;
analyzed: gang las de ltar zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gang @197b la'o ;
translated: “From which” means from which the gathering of ḍākinīs.

original: /'ching ba thams cad sreg par byed //
analyzed: /'ching ba thams cad sreg par byed //
translated: “It burns all bonds”

original: ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad do //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad do //
translated: Thus, all conceptualizations.

original: de ltar bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bya ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the action,

original: da ni de'i thabs brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de'i thabs brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the means for that,🔽he says,

original: rlung gi de nyid mngon sbyor bas //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid mngon sbyor bas //
translated: by the application of the reality of the wind,

original: zhes bya ba ni le'u bcu gnyis pa gsungs pa'i las kyi rlung gi ngo bos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni le'u bcu gnyis pa gsungs pa'i las kyi rlung gi ngo bos so //
translated: by the nature of the action wind taught in the twelfth chapter.

original: sngags kyi gzugs kyi rim pa yis //
analyzed: sngags kyi gzugs kyi rim pa yis //
translated: By the stage of the form of mantra,

original: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas so //
translated: by the prior cultivation of the creation stage.

original: rnam par rtog pa tsam yang ni //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa tsam yang ni //
translated: Even mere conceptualization,

original: zhes bya ba ni phra mo'i rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phra mo'i rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis so //
translated: by mere subtle conceptualization.🔽Mere burning,

original: sreg pa tsam du zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sreg pa tsam du zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: means making invisible.🔽Without doubt,

original: the tshom med ces bya ba ni don 'di la the tshom med pa nyid de man ngag la dbang du gyur pa tshad ma'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom med ces bya ba ni don 'di la the tshom med pa nyid de man ngag la dbang du gyur pa tshad ma'i phyir ro //
translated: means that there is no doubt about this matter, because one has become a master of the esoteric instructions.

original: de ltar de'i thabs bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i thabs bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained the means for that,

original: da ni rgyud gzhan las shes par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rgyud gzhan las shes par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach what is to be understood from other tantras,🔽he says,

original: mkha' 'gro ma sdud rgyud las ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sdud rgyud las ni //
translated: In the Dakini Samvara Tantra,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said:

original: de'i ming can gyi rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las so //
analyzed: de'i ming can gyi rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las so //
translated: In the tantra of the yoginis who bear that name,

original: shes na zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o//
analyzed: shes na zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o//
translated: knowing🔽the stages of the yoga ritual,🔽through the yoga of the Dakini Samvara,

original: rnal 'byor cho ga'i rim pa yis //🔽zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma sdud pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'i lugs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rnal 'byor goms pas zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pas so //🔽bgrod ces bya ba ni spyod yul lo //🔽mkha' 'gro ye shes rgyas pa ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor cho ga'i rim pa yis // zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma sdud pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'i lugs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to // rnal 'byor goms pas zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pas so // bgrod ces bya ba ni spyod yul lo // mkha' 'gro ye shes rgyas pa ni //
translated: the yogin🔽will travel to the realm of the dakinis.🔽The yoga of the Dakini Samvara is the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.

original: zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i ye shes so //🔽rgyas par ni zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i ye shes so // rgyas par ni zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.🔽The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The stages of the yoga ritual are the stages of the ritual of the yoga of the Dakini Samvara Tantra.

original: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: The stages

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
translated: From the “Illuminating the Profound Meaning”

original: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: The detailed explanation of the thirty-fourth chapter is complete.

original: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pas mkha' 'gro ma sdud pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan bshad nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pas mkha' 'gro ma sdud pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the reply to the question about the object of gathering the ḍākinīs in the thirty-fourth chapter,

original: da ni rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gis rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gis rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the reply to the question about the object of the characteristic of the division by the vāyu of conceptuality,🔽the thirty-fifth chapter is set forth.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa nye bar 'god cing dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa nye bar 'god cing dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa ni /
translated: The composition at the beginning is as follows:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the explanation of the thirty-fourth chapter,

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: “again” is as before.

original: rnam rtog rlung gis rnam gcod pa //
analyzed: rnam rtog rlung gis rnam gcod pa //
translated: The division by the vāyu of conceptuality

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs dang / de @198a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs dang / de @198a * //
translated: is the enumeration of the one hundred and eight concepts.

original: tsam gyi grangs kyi rlung rnams kyis gcod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: tsam gyi grangs kyi rlung rnams kyis gcod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: The cutting by the winds of the number of moments is the discrimination.

original: nyon zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: nyon zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
translated: The listen is the application to the hearing.

original: bshad kyis zhes bya ba ni brjod par zhal gyis bzhes pa'o //
analyzed: bshad kyis zhes bya ba ni brjod par zhal gyis bzhes pa'o //
translated: The explain is the promise to speak.

original: de ltar de'i rtsom pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i rtsom pa bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained its composition,

original: da ni de'i dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de'i dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain its actual content,

original: rnam rtog gi rlung gis rnam par gcod pa'i yan lag mi mthun pa'i phyogs brjod pa'i sgo nas de'i ngo bo bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam rtog gi rlung gis rnam par gcod pa'i yan lag mi mthun pa'i phyogs brjod pa'i sgo nas de'i ngo bo bstan pa ni /
translated: he teaches its nature by way of explaining the unfavorable side of the cutting by the winds of discursive thought.

original: nyin dang mtshan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: He says, day and night, and so forth.

original: nges par ni /
analyzed: nges par ni /
translated: Certainly,

original: brgya dang brgyad kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang rlung rnams so //
analyzed: brgya dang brgyad kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang rlung rnams so //
translated: one hundred and eight is the discursive thoughts and winds.

original: rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'bab pa'o //
translated: The flow is the movement.

original: rlung rnams de rnams rnam rtog ni ;
analyzed: rlung rnams de rnams rnam rtog ni ;
translated: The winds are the discursive thoughts,

original: / zhes bya ba ni le'u gsum par gsungs pa'i btang bzung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni le'u gsum par gsungs pa'i btang bzung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: which are the ones mentioned in the third chapter, beginning with the Rākṣasa.

original: de rnams dang rnam rtog ni zhes bya ba ni rlung gi stobs kyis skyes pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang rnam rtog ni zhes bya ba ni rlung gi stobs kyis skyes pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la'o //
translated: “Those” refers to the conceptual thoughts of desire, etc. , which arise by the power of the winds.

original: rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par bzlog pa'o //
translated: “Eliminate” means to turn away.

original: skye zhes bya pa ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: skye zhes bya pa ni 'byung ba'o //
translated: “Arising” means occurring.

original: gang phyir zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gang las so //
analyzed: gang phyir zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gang las so //
translated: “Because” means from which yoga.

original: rnal 'byor de ni zhes bya ba ni de ni rnal 'byor te de'i rang bzhin can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de ni zhes bya ba ni de ni rnal 'byor te de'i rang bzhin can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro //
translated: “That yoga” is that yoga, which is a special samādhi having that nature.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽zhi ba zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i rnam par rtog pa zhi bas so thams cad stong pa'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro // zhi ba zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i rnam par rtog pa zhi bas so thams cad stong pa'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: “Supreme” means that it is supramundane.🔽“Peace” means that it is peace because the conceptual thoughts of ordinary beings are pacified.

original: ces bya ba ni rim gnyis bsgom pa'i stobs kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rim gnyis bsgom pa'i stobs kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “The nature of all emptiness” means that it is the cause of the suchness that is naturally luminous by the power of meditating on the two stages.

original: de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs brjod pa'i sgo nas de'i ngo bo bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs brjod pa'i sgo nas de'i ngo bo bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained the nature of the discordant class by way of stating it,

original: da ni de'i gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rnal 'byor brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de'i gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rnal 'byor brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to state the yoga of the side of its antidote,

original: thog mar re zhig bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thog mar re zhig bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “initially, etc. ”

original: dbang bskur ba thob nas rgyud thos pa dang bsam pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thob nas rgyud thos pa dang bsam pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: Having obtained initiation, [one should practice] after hearing and contemplating the tantra.

original: rnal 'byor drug ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa gtso bor gyur pa'i 'chad bzhin pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor drug ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa gtso bor gyur pa'i 'chad bzhin pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: “ Six yogas” is by way of the six yogas that are being explained, with the creation stage as the main [practice].

original: bsgrub ces bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub ces bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
translated: “ Accomplish” means to cultivate.

original: de la rnal 'byor drug ni dang po'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor dang / rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor gyi grangs kyis rnam pa bzhir rnam par bzhag nas /
analyzed: de la rnal 'byor drug ni dang po'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor dang / rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor gyi grangs kyis rnam pa bzhir rnam par bzhag nas /
translated: Therein, the six yogas are posited as four types by way of the enumeration of the first yoga, yoga, subsequent yoga, and great yoga.

original: de'i steng du dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang / las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba dag gis rnam pha drug go //
analyzed: de'i steng du dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang / las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba dag gis rnam pha drug go //
translated: On top of that, by way of the two called “mandala-supreme king” and “action-supreme king,” there are six types.

original: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes bya ba ni @198b bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes bya ba ni @198b bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: The phrase the yogi who knows means that the meditative concentration of the stage of generation is fully understood.

original: rnal 'byor rig pas snyam du dgongs nas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas snyam du dgongs nas so //
translated: The yogi who knows means that he has the intention.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni lus rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid la rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni lus rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid la rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word supreme means that it is the cause of reality, which has the characteristic of the body's isolation.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor drug bsgom pa li rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor drug bsgom pa li rjes la'o //
translated: The phrase then, means after the cultivation of the six yogas.

original: dbyangs med yi ge ha zhes bya ba ni gzhom du med pa'i mtshan nyid can la'o //
analyzed: dbyangs med yi ge ha zhes bya ba ni gzhom du med pa'i mtshan nyid can la'o //
translated: The phrase the syllable ha, devoid of sound, means that it has the characteristic of being invincible.

original: bzlas par bya zhes bya ba ni de la yi ge gsum gzhug pa la sogs pa rnams la rnam par sbyar nas /
analyzed: bzlas par bya zhes bya ba ni de la yi ge gsum gzhug pa la sogs pa rnams la rnam par sbyar nas /
translated: The phrase should be recited means that, having applied the three syllables to it and so forth,

original: nyin dang mtshan du dbugs kyi 'khor lo'i bar mtshon bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du dbugs kyi 'khor lo'i bar mtshon bar bya ba'o //
translated: it should be indicated by the wheel of the breath day and night.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How?🔽 Therefore, it is said,

original: de'i phyir shin tu rgya cher zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: de'i phyir shin tu rgya cher zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: vastly.

original: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i grangs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i grangs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the nature of the number twenty-one thousand six hundred.

original: de ltar de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i rnal 'byor bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i rnal 'byor bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the yoga that is the antidote to that,

original: da ni de sgom po po'i yon tan bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de sgom po po'i yon tan bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the qualities of the meditator on that,

original: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Because of the syllable ha,” and so on.

original: dbyangs med pa'i yi ge ha'i ngo bo las so //
analyzed: dbyangs med pa'i yi ge ha'i ngo bo las so //
translated: The syllable ha is the nature of the syllable without sound.

original: mdud pa 'joms shing zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi mdud pa bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: mdud pa 'joms shing zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi mdud pa bzlog pa'o //
translated: “Destroying the knots” means reversing the knots of the three channels.

original: shes shing zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes shing zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong bar bya ba'o //
translated: “Knowing” means experiencing.

original: bde ba ster bar byed ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang rlung rnams bzlog pas bde ba thob par byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba ster bar byed ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang rlung rnams bzlog pas bde ba thob par byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: “Granting bliss” means that by reversing conceptuality and the vāyu, bliss is attained.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: For that reason, [the Bhagavān] declares, “By that,” and so on.

original: de yis zhes bya ba ni mdud pa 'joms pa des so //
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba ni mdud pa 'joms pa des so //
translated: “By that” means by destroying the knots.

original: rnam rtog thams cad ni zhes bya ba ni dag gi 'od gsal mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog thams cad ni zhes bya ba ni dag gi 'od gsal mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa rnams la'o //
translated: “All discursive thoughts” are those that are adverse to the clear light of the void.

original: rnam dpyod 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba dang bcas pa 'byin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam dpyod 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba dang bcas pa 'byin par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Are cut off” means that they are uprooted.

original: skad cig la ni zhes bya ba ni mdud pa 'joms pa'i skad cig la'o //
analyzed: skad cig la ni zhes bya ba ni mdud pa 'joms pa'i skad cig la'o //
translated: “In an instant” means in the instant of destroying the knots.

original: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis rnam par rtog pa dang rlung rnams gcod pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis rnam par rtog pa dang rlung rnams gcod pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the cutting off of discursive thoughts and winds by means of three topics,

original: da ni de rnam par gcod pa la thabs brjod pa'i don du de'i yan lag bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de rnam par gcod pa la thabs brjod pa'i don du de'i yan lag bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to state the means of their cutting off, he teaches the limbs of the creation stage.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “The yoga” and so forth.

original: yan lag bzhi pa dang po'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yan lag bzhi pa dang po'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is the yoga of the first four branches.

original: 'dir ni mdor bstan pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni mdor bstan pa ste /
translated: Here, it is taught in brief,

original: bco lnga yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: bco lnga yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: with “fifteen” and so forth.

original: khyad par med pa rnam pa bco lnga po ste /
analyzed: khyad par med pa rnam pa bco lnga po ste /
translated: The fifteen are without distinction,

original: khyad par du ni rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: khyad par du ni rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: and there are two distinctions.

original: 'khor dang lus kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: 'khor dang lus kyi dbye bas so //
translated: The division is into retinue and body.

original: de la 'khor ni rnam pa bcu ste /
analyzed: de la 'khor ni rnam pa bcu ste /
translated: The retinue is tenfold:🔽individually discerning one's mind,

original: rang gi sems la so sor rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i @199a * //
analyzed: rang gi sems la so sor rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i @199a * //
translated: purifying the applications of mindfulness,🔽cultivating the four offerings and the four brahma abodes,🔽observing the special place, expelling obstructors,

original: rnam par dag pa dang / mchod pa bzhi dang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa dang / gnas khyad par du 'phags pa la dmigs pa dang / bgegs bskrad pa dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / ye shes kyi sa gzhi bsgom pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa dang / mchod pa bzhi dang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa dang / gnas khyad par du 'phags pa la dmigs pa dang / bgegs bskrad pa dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / ye shes kyi sa gzhi bsgom pa dang /
translated: cultivating emptiness, cultivating the ground of gnosis,

original: gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang / mos pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang / mos pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: cultivating the celestial mansion, and cultivating the mandala of devotion.

original: lus la lnga ste /
analyzed: lus la lnga ste /
translated: The body is fivefold:🔽cultivating the ultimate mandala,

original: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi sngags byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi sngags byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: blessing the mantra of emptiness,

original: ye shes rgya mtsho las ldang ba dang / gdan gyi rnam par dbye bas bar do'i srid pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa dang sngags kyis bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho las ldang ba dang / gdan gyi rnam par dbye bas bar do'i srid pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa dang sngags kyis bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: arising from the ocean of pristine awareness, the pure intermediate state existence by the division of the seat, and the meditation on the reality of the ultimate realm and the mantra.

original: de ltar na dang po'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na dang po'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa ni /
translated: Thus, the meditation of the first yoga is

original: rnam pa bco lngas bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa bco lngas bya'o //
translated: to be done with fifteen aspects.

original: bcu bdun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs //
analyzed: bcu bdun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs //
translated: The seventeen are the subsequent yoga, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i dbye bas so //
translated: This means that the subsequent yoga, the very deep yoga, and the great yoga are the divisions.

original: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang rdo rje bsgom pa'i don du goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang rdo rje bsgom pa'i don du goms par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate means that one should become familiar with the meaning of the meditation of Hatred Vajra.

original: de la rjes su rnal 'byor ni //
analyzed: de la rjes su rnal 'byor ni //
translated: Therein, the subsequent yoga

original: rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdzogs pa'i yan lag nyid kyi phyir gcig nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdzogs pa'i yan lag nyid kyi phyir gcig nyid do //
translated: is one because it is the very limb of the perfection of the principal of the mandala by the stage of manifest enlightenment with five aspects.

original: shin tu rnal 'byor la rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor la rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The very deep yoga has four aspects.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / de'i yan lag byin gyis brlab pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / de'i yan lag byin gyis brlab pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: by the division of the aggregates, elements, sense-media, and the consecration of their limbs.

original: rnal 'byor chen po la drug ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po la drug ste /
translated: The great yoga has six:

original: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin ni sems dpa' bsgom pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin ni sems dpa' bsgom pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: the consecration of body, speech, and mind, and the pledge, intuition, and concentration, by the division of the meditation on the sattva.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i yan lag bsgrub pa chen po la rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i yan lag bsgrub pa chen po la rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The great yoga limb, the great practice, has four aspects:

original: phyag rgya'i dbye ba dang / de 'du bya ba dang / rdo rje dang / padma mnyam par sbyor ba sngon du 'gro bas de 'du bya ba dang / rjes su chags pa'i sngags brjod pa'i sgo dbye bas so //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dbye ba dang / de 'du bya ba dang / rdo rje dang / padma mnyam par sbyor ba sngon du 'gro bas de 'du bya ba dang / rjes su chags pa'i sngags brjod pa'i sgo dbye bas so //
translated: the division of the seal, the practice preceded by the union of the vajra and lotus, and the practice by the division of the door of the recitation of the mantra of passion.

original: sgrub pa la gsum ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa la gsum ste /
translated: The practice has three:

original: sgrub pa'i phan yon brjod pa dang / bde ba chen po'i mchod pa dang / mchod pa'i sngags kyis bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i phan yon brjod pa dang / bde ba chen po'i mchod pa dang / mchod pa'i sngags kyis bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: the description of the benefits of the practice, the worship of great bliss, and the description by the mantra of worship.

original: de ltar yang dag par bsdus pas bcu bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar yang dag par bsdus pas bcu bdun no //
translated: Thus, there are seventeen by the correct collection.

original: 'dis ni dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni bsdus pa bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni bsdus pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the concentration of the first yoga in brief.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go //
translated: Then, the supreme royal maṇḍala.

original: rnal 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga //
translated: The supreme yoga has five divisions.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs @199b pa dang / lhan cig spyod ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i spro ba'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs @199b pa dang / lhan cig spyod ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i spro ba'i dbye bas so //
translated: This is because of the divisions of the tathāgatas, the companions, the bodhisattvas, and the wrathful ones.

original: mchog la zhes bya ba ni lus rang bzhin med par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽de las kyang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi bsgoms pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: mchog la zhes bya ba ni lus rang bzhin med par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro // de las kyang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi bsgoms pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: “Supreme” is because it causes the realization of the body as essenceless.🔽“Then” is after the meditation of the supreme royal maṇḍala.

original: de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog rnal 'byor dbye ba bcu gnyis po //
analyzed: de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog rnal 'byor dbye ba bcu gnyis po //
translated: “From that” is the yoga of the supreme royal activity, which has twelve divisions.

original: zhes bya ba ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor dang / bzlas pa rnam pa gnyis dang / bya ba byas nas zhu ba dang / lha mo bzhis yang dag par bskul ba dang / ldang ba dang / bzhengs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ldas bstod pa dang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor dang / bzlas pa rnam pa gnyis dang / bya ba byas nas zhu ba dang / lha mo bzhis yang dag par bskul ba dang / ldang ba dang / bzhengs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ldas bstod pa dang /
translated: This is the subtle yoga, the two kinds of repetition, the dissolution, the four goddesses' perfect urging, the rising, the praise by the ten Tathagatas after rising,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nye bar bsdu ba dang / sgong skyes kyi rim pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa dang / lus gso ba'i cho ga dang / bdud rtsi myang ba dang / phyi rol gyi bza' pa'i cho ga dang / gshegs su gsol ba nas nyal ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nye bar bsdu ba dang / sgong skyes kyi rim pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa dang / lus gso ba'i cho ga dang / bdud rtsi myang ba dang / phyi rol gyi bza' pa'i cho ga dang / gshegs su gsol ba nas nyal ba'o //
translated: the withdrawal of the mandala wheel, the creation of Vajrasattva by the process of birth from the egg, the rite of body purification, the tasting of nectar, the rite of external eating, and the going to sleep after dismissal.

original: de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu //
analyzed: de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu //
translated: That is the forty-nine-fold division.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bstan pa'i yan lag ma lus pa'i grangs kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bstan pa'i yan lag ma lus pa'i grangs kyis so //
translated: This is by the enumeration of all the branches previously taught.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: The summary of the creation stage is the nature of the three samadhis.

original: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the meditation of the creation stage,🔽now, in order to teach the perfection stage, he says:

original: da ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the vajra repetition,

original: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo bstan pa ni /
translated: the limbs of that, the teaching of its nature,

original: mngon sum byed pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mngon sum byed pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: is stated with “making manifest,” etc.

original: spyir bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: spyir bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: In general, it is the creation stage.

original: don gyis na shin tu zab pa yang gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: don gyis na shin tu zab pa yang gzung bar bya'o //
translated: By implication, it should be understood as very profound.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //
translated: “ Then” means after that.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa sgom pa po'o //
translated: “ The yogi” is the one who meditates on the mantra vehicle.

original: rdo rje bzlas rim zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i rlung gi 'khor lo tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i bzlas pa ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas rim zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i rlung gi 'khor lo tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i bzlas pa ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o ;
translated: “ The vajra repetition stage” is the repetition that is accomplished by the mere wheel of wind that is indivisible like a vajra.

original: / de nyid ni rim pa ste /
analyzed: / de nyid ni rim pa ste /
translated: That itself is the stage,

original: go rims bzhin du slob pa'o //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du slob pa'o //
translated: the training in the order.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni ngag 'od gsal ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni ngag 'od gsal ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: “ Supreme” means the cause of the clear light of speech.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor bdag / ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor bdag / ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: “ The yogi of the perfection stage” is the one whose nature is the meditation of the naturally accomplished stage.

original: rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad kyi ngo bo rnams la'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad kyi ngo bo rnams la'o //
translated: “Conceptualization” refers to the nature of the one hundred and eight natures.

original: 'joms byed pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par du klog par byed pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'joms byed pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par du klog par byed pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: “Destroyer” means the nature of the one who reads the special [natures].

original: cho ga bzhin bsgom zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bzhi 'char ba'i rim pas goms par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin bsgom zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bzhi 'char ba'i rim pas goms par bya'o //
translated: “Meditate according to the rite” means to cultivate by the process of the arising of the four maṇḍalas.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rlung dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa po'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rlung dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa po'o //
translated: “The yogī” is the one who meditates on the reality of the wind and mantra.

original: phra ba'i de nyid ces @200a * //
analyzed: phra ba'i de nyid ces @200a * //
translated: “The reality of the subtle”

original: bya ba ni ma ning gi bzlas pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni ma ning gi bzlas pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: is the nature of the neuter recitation.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Unsurpassed” is because it is supramundane.

original: sngon bzhin bsgoms zhes bya ba ni rlung dang sngags kyi de nyid bsgom pa dang 'byung 'jug rjes su dran pa'i bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: sngon bzhin bsgoms zhes bya ba ni rlung dang sngags kyi de nyid bsgom pa dang 'byung 'jug rjes su dran pa'i bsgoms pas so //
translated: “Meditate as before” means to meditate on the reality of the wind and mantra and to meditate on the mindfulness of exhalation and inhalation.

original: blo dang ldan pas zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: “The wise one” is skilled in meditating on the stage of completion.

original: srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed //
translated: It cuts the bonds of existence.

original: ces bya ba ni rnam rtog gi rlung 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam rtog gi rlung 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the conquest of the conceptual winds.

original: ye shes che zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: ye shes che zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Great intuition

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas brgyud pas rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas brgyud pas rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the cause of the intuition of the Great Seal, because it is the cause of the intuition of the Great Seal.🔽Great yoga

original: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is superior to the yoga of the creation stage.🔽Great reality

original: de nyid chen po zhes bya ba ni ngag 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid chen po zhes bya ba ni ngag 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: is the nature of the clear light of speech.🔽Great wonder

original: rmad byung che zhes bya ba ni gzhan don gyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rmad byung che zhes bya ba ni gzhan don gyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the cause of the benefit of others.

original: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught its nature,

original: da ni che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to express its greatness,🔽he says,

original: nges par bsgoms pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: nges par bsgoms pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Meditating on it with certainty,

original: rlung gi ngo bo nges pas goms par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung gi ngo bo nges pas goms par bya'o //
translated: one should cultivate the nature of the wind.

original: yang dag ni zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang lhag pas bgrang ba las bzlog pas phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //🔽rnam rtog rlung ni gcod par byed //
analyzed: yang dag ni zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang lhag pas bgrang ba las bzlog pas phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so // rnam rtog rlung ni gcod par byed //
translated: The correct is the opposite of the enumeration of the nihilistic and the reifying extremes, by means of the nature of non-error.

original: ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa ni rlung gi stobs kyis skyes pa'i rang bzhin rnams dang / rlung rnams ni btang bzung la sogs pa rnams kyis gcod par byed pa'o //🔽don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa ni rlung gi stobs kyis skyes pa'i rang bzhin rnams dang / rlung rnams ni btang bzung la sogs pa rnams kyis gcod par byed pa'o // don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis //
translated: The cutting off of the winds of discursive thought is the cutting off of the winds of discursive thought, which are of the nature of arising by the power of the winds, by the winds of the garuḍa and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'di 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rlung gsum po nyin mtshan du zo chun rgyud mo'i rigs pas nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i grangs kyis 'jug par byed pa de rnams kyi don gyi rjes su 'gro
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'di 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rlung gsum po nyin mtshan du zo chun rgyud mo'i rigs pas nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i grangs kyis 'jug par byed pa de rnams kyi don gyi rjes su 'gro
translated: The recitation that follows the meaning is the recitation that follows the meaning of the three winds, which have the nature of entering, abiding, and rising, and which enter day and night by the principle of the waterwheel with the number of twenty-one thousand six hundred.

original: ba ni / ci rigs par rjes su mthun pa yongs su shes pa ni bzlas pa ste des so //
analyzed: ba ni / ci rigs par rjes su mthun pa yongs su shes pa ni bzlas pa ste des so //
translated: The recitation is the knowledge of the suitability of the concordant following of those, by means of the recitation that follows the meaning.

original: dngos med ces bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir bzhin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dngos med ces bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir bzhin dang bral ba'o //
translated: Non-entity is the absence of a face due to dependent origination.

original: ngo bo gcig pa dang zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo gcig pas so //
analyzed: ngo bo gcig pa dang zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo gcig pas so //
translated: One nature is due to the nature of that being one.

original: stong nyid goms pa la nam pa dang // zhes bya ba ni de dang de'i sgo nas stong pa nyid la goms pas so //
analyzed: stong nyid goms pa la nam pa dang // zhes bya ba ni de dang de'i sgo nas stong pa nyid la goms pas so //
translated: Cultivating emptiness is through cultivating emptiness in that and that way.

original: nges par bya ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par bya ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The definite is the stage of non-returning.

original: bstan par sgom pa po zhes bya ba ni rlung bsgoms pas brtson 'grus drag po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bstan par sgom pa po zhes bya ba ni rlung bsgoms pas brtson 'grus drag po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The teacher is the one who has intense diligence through cultivating the wind.

original: sgrub po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: sgrub po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa sgom pa po'o //
translated: The practitioner is the one who cultivates the stage of vajra repetition.

original: bsgoms byas @200b na zhes bya ba ni goms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgoms byas @200b na zhes bya ba ni goms par byed pa'o //
translated: Having cultivated is having become familiar.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: Correct is through the nature of non-error.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba mi phyed pa'i bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba mi phyed pa'i bzlas pa'o //
