original: zhes bya ba la dus ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dus ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can la'o //
translated: Time is internal and external.

original: mtshan nyid sdom pa ni mtshan nyid bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid sdom pa ni mtshan nyid bsdu ba'o //
translated: The characteristics are summarized.

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor gang gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor gang gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said by which yoga, etc.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor rnams so //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor rnams so //
translated: The yogas of the one who meditates on the completion stage.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni dus kyi mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni dus kyi mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: By which means by the characteristics of time.

original: grangs kyi rnal 'byor rnam par shes //
analyzed: grangs kyi rnal 'byor rnam par shes //
translated: The yoga of number is consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bshad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bshad par bya ba'o //
translated: This is the explanation of that.

original: grangs kyi rnal 'byor ni rlung gi grangs kyi rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: grangs kyi rnal 'byor ni rlung gi grangs kyi rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The yoga of number is the yoga of the number of the winds.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni 'di las gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni 'di las gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Unsurpassed means that there is nothing higher than this.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus brjod par 'dod pas de ltar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus brjod par 'dod pas de ltar brjod pa'o //
translated: The inconceivable time is expressed in this way by one who wishes to speak of it.

original: de ltar rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the composition,

original: da ni de dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to directly explain that,🔽he says,

original: de'i yan lag dus kyi rab tu dbye ba ni //
analyzed: de'i yan lag dus kyi rab tu dbye ba ni //
translated: The division of time, which is a branch of that,

original: dus ni dus tshod ces ni bshad //
analyzed: dus ni dus tshod ces ni bshad //
translated: Time is said to be the occasion.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so forth.

original: dus ni zla ba dang nyi ma rgyu bar byed pa'i dus te /
analyzed: dus ni zla ba dang nyi ma rgyu bar byed pa'i dus te /
translated: Time is the occasion of the movement of the sun and moon,

original: dus kyi rnam grangs nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽de yang bsams dang bsam min ngo bo ni //
analyzed: dus kyi rnam grangs nyid kyi phyir ro // de yang bsams dang bsam min ngo bo ni //
translated: because it is a synonym for time.🔽Moreover, it is said to be

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The nature of the thought and the non-thought.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nyams su myang bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nyams su myang bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is to be experienced by the yogis.

original: dus bzang dang ni zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi dus bzang po dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dus bzang dang ni zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi dus bzang po dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase good time is so called because it is like an external good time.

original: dus ngan dang zhes bya ba yang de lta bu nyid do //🔽rnam pa gnyis ni kun du gnas //🔽zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis kyi phyi rol dang bstan rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: dus ngan dang zhes bya ba yang de lta bu nyid do // rnam pa gnyis ni kun du gnas // zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis kyi phyi rol dang bstan rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: The phrase bad time is so called because it is like an external bad time.🔽The phrase two kinds is so called because it is like an external two kinds.

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: The phrase abides is so called because it is like an external abiding.

original: de ltar dus kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dus kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the divisions of time,

original: da ni de'i mtshan nyid brjod pa'i @206b phyir ro ;
analyzed: da ni de'i mtshan nyid brjod pa'i @206b phyir ro ;
translated: now, in order to state its characteristics,🔽he says:

original: / de'i yan lag nang gi dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: / de'i yan lag nang gi dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni /
translated: The characteristics of the two internal times are

original: sna'i bu ga gnyis nas 'bab pa'i rgyun gyis so //
analyzed: sna'i bu ga gnyis nas 'bab pa'i rgyun gyis so //
translated: the two streams that flow from the nostrils.

original: srog dang rtsol ba gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i dbugs gnyis so //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i dbugs gnyis so //
translated: The phrase prāṇa and āyāma refers to the two breaths, exhalation and inhalation.

original: mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rgyu ba ma 'dres pas so //
analyzed: mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rgyu ba ma 'dres pas so //
translated: The phrase equal refers to the fact that the right and left movements are not mixed.

original: 'bab ces bya ba ni rab tu 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: 'bab ces bya ba ni rab tu 'bab pa'o //
translated: The phrase flow refers to the fact that they flow well.

original: gang du zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs gang la'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs gang la'o //
translated: Where means in what situation.

original: dus bzang zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas med pas dus bzang po dang chos mthun pas de ltar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: dus bzang zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas med pas dus bzang po dang chos mthun pas de ltar brjod pa yin no //
translated: Good time means that it is called that because it is similar to a good time, since there are no signs of death.

original: dus ngan de las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: dus ngan de las bzlog pa'o //
translated: Bad time is the opposite of that.

original: zhes bya ba ni srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung 'dres pas zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung 'dres pas zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: This means that the life-force and exertion vāyus are mixed.

original: / de ltar nang gi dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: / de ltar nang gi dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the characteristics of the two internal times,

original: da ni phyi'i dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni phyi'i dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the characteristics of the two external times,

original: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “like that” and so on is stated.

original: da ltar gyi dus ni dus bzang por brjod de /
analyzed: da ltar gyi dus ni dus bzang por brjod de /
translated: The present time is called the good time

original: 'bad pa med pas bde bas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bad pa med pas bde bas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one abides in bliss without effort.

original: 'das pa'i dus ni dus ngan no //
analyzed: 'das pa'i dus ni dus ngan no //
translated: The past time is the bad time.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means the past.

original: de ltar phyi'i dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyi'i dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the characteristics of the two external times,🔽now, in order to explain the characteristics of the two internal times,

original: da ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pas de'i mtshan nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pas de'i mtshan nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to state the definition of that by the intention of joy and so forth,

original: dus ngan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dus ngan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares, “the bad time” and so forth.

original: mchog dga' las gzhan pa yin zhes bya ba ni mchog dga' las gzhan pa ni dga' bral gyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: mchog dga' las gzhan pa yin zhes bya ba ni mchog dga' las gzhan pa ni dga' bral gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: “ Other than the supreme joy” means that which is other than the supreme joy is the nature of the joyless,

original: de'i dus su bde ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dus su bde ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time one is separated from bliss.

original: dus bzang po mchog ste zhes bya ba ni mchog dga' las mngon sum nyid du ste /
analyzed: dus bzang po mchog ste zhes bya ba ni mchog dga' las mngon sum nyid du ste /
translated: “ The good time is supreme” means that it is manifest from the supreme joy,

original: byang chub kyi sems yan lag thams cad kyi mtshams khyab pas 'bras bu mang po bri ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems yan lag thams cad kyi mtshams khyab pas 'bras bu mang po bri ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the bodhicitta pervades all the joints and fills many fruits.

original: de ltar dga' ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pas de'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dga' ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pas de'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the definition of that by the intention of joy and so forth,

original: da ni phyi rol gyi dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid slar yang rdzogs pa dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: da ni phyi rol gyi dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid slar yang rdzogs pa dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: now, the definition of the two external times is again taught by “the full” and so forth.

original: dus dang po gsum ni nyi shu dang bco lnga dang 'bum phrag bcu'i lo'i tshad dang 'bras bu gsum sgrub par byed pas na /
analyzed: dus dang po gsum ni nyi shu dang bco lnga dang 'bum phrag bcu'i lo'i tshad dang 'bras bu gsum sgrub par byed pas na /
translated: The first three eons are the lengths of twenty, fifteen and one hundred thousand years, respectively.🔽

original: dus bzang po zhes brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: dus bzang po zhes brjod pa yin te /
translated: The first three eons are called “good eons” because they are the measure of twenty, fifteen, and one hundred thousand years, and because they accomplish the three fruits.

original: tshe dang 'bras bu la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni shin tu yang mang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshe dang 'bras bu la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni shin tu yang mang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because life and fruit, etc., are very abundant.

original: rtsod dus ni ngan pa ste zhes bya ba ni snyigs ma lngas bsgribs pa'i phyir dang / tshe thung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽de ltar zhes bya ba ni @207a * //
analyzed: rtsod dus ni ngan pa ste zhes bya ba ni snyigs ma lngas bsgribs pa'i phyir dang / tshe thung ba nyid kyi phyir ro // de ltar zhes bya ba ni @207a * //
translated: The eon of strife is bad because it is obscured by the five degenerations and because life is short.🔽Thus, means in this way.

original: rnam pa de lta bus so //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bus so //
translated: In this way, means in this way.

original: dus mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: dus mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi ngo bo la'o //
translated: The characteristics of the eon are external entities.

original: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: It is said means it is expressed.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis mdor bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis mdor bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained in brief by way of four topics,

original: da ni rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain in detail,

original: de'i yan lag dga' ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pas dus gnyis kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i yan lag dga' ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pas dus gnyis kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the nature of the two eons by way of the intention of joy, etc., which are its branches,🔽he says:

original: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The joy and supreme joy are mentioned.

original: cung zad tsam gyis bde ba dang // de las lhag pa'i ngo bo brgyud pa'i rgyud dang dngos kyi rgyu'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: cung zad tsam gyis bde ba dang // de las lhag pa'i ngo bo brgyud pa'i rgyud dang dngos kyi rgyu'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The joy is the state of slight bliss, and the supreme joy is the state of superior bliss, which is the state of the cause of the continuity and the state of the direct cause.

original: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ni dpe'i ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ni dpe'i ngo bo la'o //
translated: The innate is the state of the example.

original: dus bzang ste zhes bya ba ni gsum po de rnams dus bzang po'i sgras brjod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: dus bzang ste zhes bya ba ni gsum po de rnams dus bzang po'i sgras brjod par bya ba ste /
translated: The good time is the state of the three, which is to be expressed by the word good time,

original: gong nas gong du bde ba 'phel ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gong nas gong du bde ba 'phel ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the increasing of bliss in a higher and higher degree, together with its fruit.

original: bral dgar bshad pa dus ngan ni //
analyzed: bral dgar bshad pa dus ngan ni //
translated: The bad time is explained as the state of separation.

original: bde ba nyams pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / chags bral gyi bdag nyid can nyid dang / rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba nyams pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / chags bral gyi bdag nyid can nyid dang / rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the state of the decrease of bliss, the state of the nature of separation from passion, and the state of being associated with discursive thought.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par bstan pa'i cho gas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par bstan pa'i cho gas so //
translated: Thus means in the manner just taught.

original: dus kyi zhes bya ba ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: dus kyi zhes bya ba ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo la'o //
translated: The time is the state of joy, etc.

original: mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term definition means the presentation of the uncommon reality.

original: de ltar dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'dod pas /
analyzed: de ltar dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'dod pas /
translated: Thus, through the desire for joy, etc.,

original: dus gnyis kyi rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /🔽da ni dbugs gsum gyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: dus gnyis kyi rang gi ngo bo bstan nas / da ni dbugs gsum gyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: the nature of the two times has been taught.

original: de'i ngo bo bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the nature of those [times] by following the three breaths,🔽[the Bhagavān] declares,

original: 'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The time of entering and abiding🔽is good,🔽and the time of rising is bad.

original: bzang por ni zhes bya ba ni dus bzang po'o //
analyzed: bzang por ni zhes bya ba ni dus bzang po'o //
translated: The term good means a good time.

original: yongs su grangs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa ste lus kyi nang du dbugs sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su grangs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa ste lus kyi nang du dbugs sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term counted means expressed, because it draws the breath into the body.

original: ldang ba yang ni dus ngan po //
analyzed: ldang ba yang ni dus ngan po //
translated: The time of rising is bad,

original: zhes bya ba ni dbugs rnams phyir 'byung bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbugs rnams phyir 'byung bas so //
translated: because the breaths go out.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni dbugs gsum la ltos nas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni dbugs gsum la ltos nas so //
translated: Thus, in dependence on the three breaths,

original: dus kyi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dus kyi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni dus gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: the definition of the two times is explained.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa dag gis de'i mtshan nyid brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa dag gis de'i mtshan nyid brjod nas /
translated: Having thus expressed its definition through a brief presentation and an extensive explanation,

original: da ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the definition of the inconceivable time,

original: de'i yan lag byang chub kyi sems gnyis kyi rjes su 'brangs nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi ngo bo ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag byang chub kyi sems gnyis kyi rjes su 'brangs nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi ngo bo ni /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the essence of the inconceivable time, following after the two aspects of the awakening mind.

original: dus ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dus ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Time is the supreme taste of the equality of all constituents.

original: @207b kun nas 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: @207b kun nas 'gro ba'o //
translated: It is the supreme taste of the equality of all constituents.

original: khams rnams thams cad de zhes bya ba ni so dang sen mo la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam 'gyur rnams la'o //
analyzed: khams rnams thams cad de zhes bya ba ni so dang sen mo la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam 'gyur rnams la'o //
translated: It is the supreme taste of the equality of all constituents, in the sense that it is the object of all constituents, such as teeth, nails, and so forth, which are the transformations of the awakening mind.

original: mnyam pa'i ro'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni khams rnams thams cad kyi yul la tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa bcom pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i ro'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni khams rnams thams cad kyi yul la tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa bcom pa'o //
translated: The state of taste is the destruction of the conceptualization of difference with respect to the object of all constituents.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyur gyur pas so //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyur gyur pas so //
translated: It is supreme because it is the cause of the connate [joy].

original: ye shes rnam shes rnam par spangs //
analyzed: ye shes rnam shes rnam par spangs //
translated: Wisdom and consciousness are abandoned.

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes ni dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes ni dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the characteristic of the example of the simultaneously-arisen gnosis.

original: rnam shes ni don gyi lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rnam shes ni don gyi lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Consciousness is the characteristic of the simultaneously-arisen object.

original: de dag dang bral ba ni rnam par spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag dang bral ba ni rnam par spangs pa'o //
translated: The absence of those is the abandonment.

original: dus gcig ces bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dus gcig ces bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The one time is the nature of the inconceivable time.

original: zhes ni brjod pa yin zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes ni brjod pa yin zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is what is said is what is taught.

original: de ltar byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: Thus, following the two kinds of bodhicitta,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: the nature of the inconceivable time is taught.

original: bzhi pa'i 'dod pas de'i ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bzhi pa'i 'dod pas de'i ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to express its nature with the desire of the fourth,

original: dngos dang dngos med dga' ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med dga' ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the joy of entity and non-entity, and so on, is stated.

original: dngos dang dngos med ni dga' ba dang mchog dga' gnyis te /
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med ni dga' ba dang mchog dga' gnyis te /
translated: Entity and non-entity are the two, joy and supreme joy,

original: cung zad bde ba'i rnam pa nyid kyis dngos po'i phyir dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su dngos med nyid do //
analyzed: cung zad bde ba'i rnam pa nyid kyis dngos po'i phyir dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su dngos med nyid do //
translated: because of being slightly blissful, they are entity, and at the time of the connate, they are non-entity.

original: de'i ngo bo'i cha las ni //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo'i cha las ni //
translated: From the aspect of its essence,

original: rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: it is conceptual.

original: 'das pa ni bral ba'o //
analyzed: 'das pa ni bral ba'o //
translated: The past is separation.

original: bzhi pa skad cig mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: bzhi pa skad cig mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The fourth has the characteristic of a moment.

original: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: This is the innate aspect.

original: brjod bya rjod byed las grol ba //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod byed las grol ba //
translated: It is free from the expressed and the expresser.

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' bral dang bral ba'i phyir dang / dga' bral ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' bral dang bral ba'i phyir dang / dga' bral ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is free from the separation from joy, and because the separation from joy is conceptual.

original: dus gcig ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so //
analyzed: dus gcig ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so //
translated: At one time, as before, it is the inconceivable time.

original: de ltar bzhi pa'i 'dod pas rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bzhi pa'i 'dod pas rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught its essence through the desire of the fourth,

original: da ni phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bos de'i ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /🔽chags dang chags bral nges grol ba //
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bos de'i ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir / chags dang chags bral nges grol ba //
translated: now, in order to express its essence through the essence of the great seal,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said:🔽It is definitely liberated from attachment and separation from attachment.

original: stong pa dang shin tu stong pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa dang shin tu stong pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is free from emptiness and utter emptiness.

original: chags dang chags bral dag las nges par grol ba snyam du dgongs nas so //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral dag las nges par grol ba snyam du dgongs nas so //
translated: Thinking that it is definitely liberated from attachment and separation from attachment.

original: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang spangs //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang spangs //
translated: And the state of great bliss is abandoned.

original: zhes bya ba ni stong pa chen po dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni stong pa chen po dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is devoid of the great emptiness.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi gzhi ni rten te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi gzhi ni rten te /
translated: The basis characterized by the great seal is the support,

original: thams cad stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽dus gcig ces ni @208a * //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro // dus gcig ces ni @208a * //
translated: because it is the nature of the emptiness of everything.

original: brjod pa yin //
analyzed: brjod pa yin //
translated: It is said to be “at one time.”

original: zhes bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the inconceivable time.

original: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having described the characteristic of the inconceivable with three topics,

original: da ni de'i nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de'i nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach its summary,

original: mtshan nyid med ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Without characteristic,”

original: so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the domain of the conduct of ordinary beings.

original: mtshan nyid 'das zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'das zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Beyond characteristic” is because there is no demonstrator.

original: grangs kyi rnal 'byor rnam par spangs //
analyzed: grangs kyi rnal 'byor rnam par spangs //
translated: The yoga of number is abandoned.

original: zhes bya ba ni gcig dang mang po nyid kyis grangs nus pa'i phyir dang / rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gcig dang mang po nyid kyis grangs nus pa'i phyir dang / rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag go //
translated: This is because the number is capable of being one or many, and yoga is a particular kind of concentration.

original: de dag gi rnam par spangs pa ni dor ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rnam par spangs pa ni dor ba'o //
translated: The abandonment of those is letting go.

original: de nyid dus su zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i ngo bo ngas bshad de zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid dus su zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i ngo bo ngas bshad de zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That itself is at the right time, and I have explained the nature of reality means

original: drug pa rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
analyzed: drug pa rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
translated: that the Blessed One in the form of Vajradhara of the sixth family has explained it.

original: shes par bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes par bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: What is to be known is what is to be known.

original: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal las so //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal las so //
translated: From the guru's mouth means from the mouth of the vajra master. 🔽This is the commentary on the thirty-ninth chapter of the tantra, called ,

original: rnal 'byor chen po dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa las /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa las /
translated: the explanation of the yoga of the great yoga, the glorious Vajra Garland,

original: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa'i /
analyzed: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa'i /
translated: composed by the paṇḍita Alaṃkakalaśa.

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the Illumination of the Profound Meaning,

original: le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: the commentary on the thirty-ninth chapter of the great tantra of the glorious Vajra Garland.

original: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pas dus kyi yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pas dus kyi yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /
translated: Having thus answered the questions about the domain of time in the thirty-ninth chapter,

original: da ni gsang ba'i 'bras bu'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gsang ba'i 'bras bu'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to demonstrate the answer to the questions about the domain of the secret result,

original: le'u bzhi bcu pa nye bar 'god cing /
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu pa nye bar 'god cing /
translated: the fortieth chapter is introduced.

original: dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa bshad pa ni /
translated: First, at the outset, the composition is explained.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the explanation of the thirty-ninth chapter.🔽Also, etc.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa bzhin du'o //
translated: As previously taught.

original: gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The secret result is the aspect of union.

original: mchog nyid ces bya ba ni bla na med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog nyid ces bya ba ni bla na med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme means unsurpassed.

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that by which, etc.

original: gsang ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The secret result.

original: dngos grub ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: dngos grub ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
translated: Accomplishment means the accomplishment of the great seal.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni gong na med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni gong na med pa'o //
translated: Supreme means unsurpassed.

original: 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “Going” means that which is to be gone.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //🔽phyag rgya chen po yang dag rten //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o // phyag rgya chen po yang dag rten //
translated: “Yogis” means the remainder.🔽“The support of the great seal”

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rten no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rten no //
translated: means the support of the supramundane great seal.

original: de ltar de'i rtsom pa @208b bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i rtsom pa @208b bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught its composition,

original: da ni de'i dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de'i dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain its actual meaning,🔽he says, “The secret, hidden,

original: de'i yan lag gsang ba rang gi dngos grub ni //🔽gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad //
analyzed: de'i yan lag gsang ba rang gi dngos grub ni // gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad //
translated: own spiritual power of that🔽is explained as ‘secretly hidden.’

original: ces bya ba gsungs te zab mo'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te zab mo'o //
translated: ” It is profound.

original: rnal 'byor pas mi shes shing zhes bya ba ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa po rnams kyi yul la ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas mi shes shing zhes bya ba ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa po rnams kyi yul la ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Not known to yogis” means that it is not the domain of beginner yogis who meditate on the creation stage.

original: bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming //
translated: “The name ‘fourth consecration’”

original: zhes bya ba ni zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa'i rim pas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa'i rim pas gnas pa'o //
translated: means that it is transmitted from mouth to mouth.

original: mchog gi ye shes zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: mchog gi ye shes zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: “Supreme intuition” means innate intuition.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po nyid kyi phyir ro // kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: The term peace is because it is the antidote to the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience.

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from all conceptualization because it is free from the conceptualization of self and other.

original: de ltar gsang ba'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the secret essence,

original: 'bras bu'i ngo bo phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i ngo bo phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the essence of the great seal, the essence of the result,

original: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, the great seal, and so on.

original: dga' ba chen po ster bar byed pas na phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba chen po ster bar byed pas na phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called great seal because it bestows great bliss.

original: dngos grub che zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa //
analyzed: dngos grub che zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub nyid kyi phyir ro // rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa //
translated: It is called great power because it is a supramundane power.🔽It is the great yoga because it is the essence of the vajra-like samadhi.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis zung du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis zung du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the great summary because it is the essence of the union.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i don rgya chen po bsdus pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i don rgya chen po bsdus pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The essence of the collection of the great meaning of the yoginīs.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi zhal las rtogs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi zhal las rtogs //
translated: One should understand from the mouth of the yoginī.

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud las rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud las rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because it should be understood from the Jñānaḍāka Tantra.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni khyad du 'phags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni khyad du 'phags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme means that it is the essence of excellence and the essence of transcending the world.

original: mchog tu rmad 'byung zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu rmad 'byung zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme marvel means that it is the nature of accomplishing the welfare of others.

original: rnam pa chen po'i yon tan zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam pa chen po'i yon tan zhes bya ba la /
translated: Great aspect of qualities.

original: chen po ni lha'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: chen po ni lha'i rnam pa ste /
translated: Great means the aspect of the deity.

original: der yang dag 'bebs pa ni 'bebs pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: der yang dag 'bebs pa ni 'bebs pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Correct descent means the nature of descent.

original: de nyid chen po yon tan ldan //
analyzed: de nyid chen po yon tan ldan //
translated: Endowed with the qualities of the great reality.

original: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid chen po ma ning gi bzlas pa'i ngo bo'i yon tan gyis ngag 'od gsal ba'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid chen po ma ning gi bzlas pa'i ngo bo'i yon tan gyis ngag 'od gsal ba'i rnam pas so //
translated: The qualities of the nature of the recitation of the neuter, the great reality, are the speech in the aspect of luminosity.

original: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽mchog gi nam mkha' gnas zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par dag @209a * //
analyzed: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to // mchog gi nam mkha' gnas zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par dag @209a * //
translated: “Endowed” means having the nature of following.

original: pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Dwelling in the supreme space” means the nature of the mind is pure.

original: phra ba'i zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu po zhes bya ba 'gags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo //
analyzed: phra ba'i zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu po zhes bya ba 'gags pa nyid kyi phyir ro // rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo //
translated: “Subtle” means the nature of the one hundred and sixty are ceased.

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro // bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed //
translated: “Vajrasattva’s own nature” means the nature of self-consecration.

original: ces bya ba ni bde ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //🔽'phel bar byed ces bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bde ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o // 'phel bar byed ces bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
translated: “Increasing all bliss” means that bliss is supramundane.

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i ngo bo'i rim pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i ngo bo'i rim pa nyid kyi phyir ro // bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
translated: “Increasing” means perfecting, because it is the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba ni stong pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni stong pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Dwelling in the state of great bliss” means the nature of great emptiness.

original: shes dang shes bya rnam par bral //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya rnam par bral //
translated: “Free from the object of knowledge”

original: zhes bya ba ni rtag chad gnyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtag chad gnyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is free from the two extremes of eternalism and nihilism.

original: bsgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs //
analyzed: bsgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs //
translated: Meditation and the object of meditation are abandoned.

original: zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no conceptualization of difference.

original: sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong //
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong //
translated: It is empty of the activities of mantra and tantra.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags ni sa bon gyi yi ge rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags ni sa bon gyi yi ge rnams so //
translated: Here, mantra refers to the seed syllables.

original: rgyud ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'o //
translated: Tantra refers to the meditation on the moon disc, and so forth.

original: de'i ngo bo'i bya bas stong pa ste /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo'i bya bas stong pa ste /
translated: It is empty of the activities that have that as their nature.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is free from the characteristics of the stage of generation.

original: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: It abandons all conceptualization.

original: zhes bya ba ni kun du rtog pa thams cad rlung gi rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kun du rtog pa thams cad rlung gi rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: All conceptualization is of the nature of the winds.

original: spangs pa ni rnam par bral ba ste /
analyzed: spangs pa ni rnam par bral ba ste /
translated: Abandonment is freedom.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa las khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa las khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is superior to the stage of vajra repetition.

original: dngos po kun gyi go 'phang rgal //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi go 'phang rgal //
translated: It crosses over to the state of all things.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: dngos po kun ni snang ba la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: dngos po kun ni snang ba la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: All things are appearances and so forth.🔽Their state is the abode, the nature of the assembly of the innate.

original: de rnams kyi go 'phang ni gnas te rang bzhin gyi tshogs kyi ngo bo la de las rgal ba ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyi go 'phang ni gnas te rang bzhin gyi tshogs kyi ngo bo la de las rgal ba ni /
translated: Having crossed over that,

original: bral bas te sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral bas te sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: one is free, because of the superiority of the stage of the purification of the mind.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi rnam par spangs //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi rnam par spangs //
translated: Having abandoned the three worlds,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: the three worlds are the nature of illusion, free from conceptualization.

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of being free from the stage of self-consecration.

original: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
translated: Having abandoned attachment and non-attachment,

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir chags bral rnam par spangs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir chags bral rnam par spangs pa'o //
translated: because of being free from the stage of the seal and samādhi, one is free from non-attachment.

original: dam tshig chen po la gnas pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po la gnas pa // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Abiding in the great pledge,

original: dam tshig chen po ni zung du @209b 'jug pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni zung du @209b 'jug pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: the great pledge is the aspect of union.

original: de la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'o //
translated: Abiding in that,

original: 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba ni khams gsum po rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba ni khams gsum po rnams so //
translated: The three worlds are the three realms.

original: ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad do //
analyzed: ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad do //
translated: Without exception means all.

original: gcig ces bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
translated: One means not shared in common.

original: de'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not mixed with the conceptualizations of others.

original: rgyu zhes bya ba ni rgyu'o ;
analyzed: rgyu zhes bya ba ni rgyu'o ;
translated: Cause means the cause.

original: / dngos grub de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid can la'o //
analyzed: / dngos grub de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid can la'o //
translated: The reality of powers means the reality of mundane and supramundane powers.

original: de ltar 'bras bu'i ngo bos phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu'i ngo bos phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of the great seal by way of its result,

original: da ni gsang ba dang 'bras bu nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gsang ba dang 'bras bu nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the summary of the secret and the result,

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says thus, etc.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: Thus means by the reasoning explained above.

original: gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The secret result is the form of union.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The term clear is used because it appears in the direct perception of the yogi.

original: gang du yang zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang du yang zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
translated: The term anywhere refers to Action Tantra and so forth.

original: ma gsungs zhes bya ba ni ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ma gsungs zhes bya ba ni ma bstan pa'o //
translated: The term not taught means not explained.

original: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The term supreme knowledge is used because it is the supreme nature of the result.

original: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The term supreme yoga is used because it is the supreme form of samadhi.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: The term know means should know.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro'i man dag las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro'i man dag las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term of the yoginis means from the instructions of the dakinis of wisdom.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The glorious Vajra Garland, a commentary on the great yoga tantra,

original: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: was composed by the paṇḍita Alaṃkakalaśa.

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the commentary called Illuminating the Profound Meaning,

original: le'u bzhi bcu pa'i rgya cher bshad ba'o /
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu pa'i rgya cher bshad ba'o /
translated: this is the commentary on the fortieth chapter.

original: // / de ltar le'u bzhi bcu pas gsang ba'i 'bras bu'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /🔽da ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u bzhi bcu pas gsang ba'i 'bras bu'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas / da ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Chapter XLIV🔽The Explanation of the Chapter🔽The Explanation of the Chapter🔽The Explanation of the Chapter

original: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa nye bar 'god cing /
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa nye bar 'god cing /
translated: The Explanation of the Chapter

original: dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa bstan pa ni /🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa bstan pa ni / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
