analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The Explanation of the Chapter🔽The Explanation of the Chapter

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi mchog ces bya ba dang 'brel to //🔽ji lta bu zhi na /🔽de'i phyir mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi mchog ces bya ba dang 'brel to // ji lta bu zhi na / de'i phyir mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The Explanation of the Chapter🔽The Explanation of the Chapter

original: @210a * // chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @210a * // chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Explanation of the Chapter

original: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: The Explanation of the Chapter🔽The Explanation of the Chapter

original: da ni de dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: The Explanation of the

original: de'i yan lag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gi nges pa'i tshig gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i yan lag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gi nges pa'i tshig gsungs te /
translated: The branch of that is the explanation of the verbal definition of the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kun dbus nas khyab pa'i khams //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos kun dbus nas khyab pa'i khams // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The realm that pervades the middle of all phenomena

original: kun ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: kun ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'am /
translated: Here, “all” refers to the aggregates, constituents, sense spheres, and so on,

original: shes pa dang shes byas bsdus pa rnams so //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes byas bsdus pa rnams so //
translated: or to what is included in consciousness and objects of consciousness.

original: dbus nas zhes bya ba ni nang du son pa ste /
analyzed: dbus nas zhes bya ba ni nang du son pa ste /
translated: “Middle” means “having entered inside.”

original: ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Whatever is the essence of the abiding state

original: chos kun dbus su son pa'o //
analyzed: chos kun dbus su son pa'o //
translated: is “having entered the middle of all phenomena.”

original: khams zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: khams zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas so //
translated: “Realm” means “holding one’s own characteristics.”

original: chos kyi dbyings zhes de la brjod //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings zhes de la brjod //
translated: That is called the dharmadhātu.

original: ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: That is the explanation.

original: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gi nges pa'i tshig brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gi nges pa'i tshig brjod nas /
translated: Having explained the verbal definition of the dharmadhātu in that way,

original: da ni de'i don mdor bstan pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: da ni de'i don mdor bstan pa'i sgo nas /
translated: now, having briefly indicated its meaning,

original: chos kyi tshig bshad pa ni /
analyzed: chos kyi tshig bshad pa ni /
translated: the explanation of the term “dharma” is

original: kun khyab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: kun khyab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “pervading all” and so on.

original: chos ma lus pa la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos ma lus pa la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it pervades all phenomena without exception.

original: shin tu phra ba zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i spyod yul nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i spyod yul nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Extremely subtle” means that it is the domain of the noble ones.

original: kun khyab ces bya ba ni khyab bya'i ngo bos thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun khyab ces bya ba ni khyab bya'i ngo bos thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Pervasive” means that it pervades all things by the nature of what is pervaded.

original: kun du 'char ba dang zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo gnas pa'o //
analyzed: kun du 'char ba dang zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo gnas pa'o //
translated: “Universally manifest” means that it abides as the nature that is connate with everything at all times.

original: phung po lnga nyid ces bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga nyid ces bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The five aggregates” are form, feeling, and so on.

original: 'byung ba bzhi zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi po'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi po'o //
translated: “The four elements” are the four elements of earth and so on.

original: yul dang zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: yul dang zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: “The objects” are forms and so on.

original: skye mched ces bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid can mig la sogs pa rnams so ;
analyzed: skye mched ces bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid can mig la sogs pa rnams so ;
translated: “The sense sources” are the inner sense sources of the eyes and so on.

original: / rnam shes zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: / rnam shes zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Consciousness” is the eye consciousness and so on.

original: yang dag ldan zhes bya ba ni de rnams dang ldan pa thams cad chos kun zhes bya bar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag ldan zhes bya ba ni de rnams dang ldan pa thams cad chos kun zhes bya bar brjod pa'o //
translated: “Correctly endowed” means that all that is endowed with those is called “all phenomena.”

original: bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
translated: “Explained” means taught.

original: gsang ba'i dbang phyug gi zhes bya ba ni gsang ba ni gsang ba pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang phyug gi zhes bya ba ni gsang ba ni gsang ba pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The lord of the secret is the secret of the secret ones.

original: dbang phyug ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: dbang phyug ni gtso bo ste /
translated: The lord is the principal one,

original: gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
translated: the master of the secret.

original: de nyid ni /
analyzed: de nyid ni /
translated: That itself

original: de rnams la gzhan dbang ba med pas na dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: de rnams la gzhan dbang ba med pas na dbang phyug ste /
translated: is the lord because it is not dependent on others.

original: de'i bod pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bod pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is what it is called.

original: de ltar de'i don mdor bstan pa'i sgo nas chos kyi tshig bshad pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i don mdor bstan pa'i sgo nas chos kyi tshig bshad pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus expressed the explanation of the terms of the Dharma through a brief presentation of its meaning,

original: da ni dbyings @210b kyi tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dbyings @210b kyi tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the term of the dhātu,

original: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says those and so on.

original: de rnams ni de ma thag par bstan pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams ni de ma thag par bstan pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Those refers to the aggregates and so on that were just explained.

original: dbus na gnas zhes bya ba ni khyab byed nyid kyis dbus na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dbus na gnas zhes bya ba ni khyab byed nyid kyis dbus na gnas pa'o //
translated: Abiding in the middle means abiding in the middle by pervading.

original: khams zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: khams zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas so //
translated: Realm means holding one's own characteristics.

original: khyab cing zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa'i bdag nyid kyis khyab bya rnams la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab cing zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa'i bdag nyid kyis khyab bya rnams la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Pervading means abiding in the pervaded by the nature of nonconceptuality.

original: spyod yul ma yin te zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i blo'i spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyod yul ma yin te zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i blo'i spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase not within the range of experience means that it is not within the range of experience of the minds of ordinary beings.

original: de ltar dbyings kyi tshig bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dbyings kyi tshig bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the explanation of the term dhātu,

original: da ni dpe'i sgo nas bshad pa brjod pa'i /
analyzed: da ni dpe'i sgo nas bshad pa brjod pa'i /
translated: now, in order to state the explanation by way of example,🔽he says, Just as oil is in the sesame seed, etc.

original: phyir ; ji ltar til la til mar dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phyir ; ji ltar til la til mar dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Just as oil is in the sesame seed,🔽Just as fire is in wood,

original: ji ltar til 'bru'i nang na mar nag gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar til 'bru'i nang na mar nag gnas pa'o //
translated: just as butter is in milk,🔽Just as the sky is in space,

original: ji ltar shing la me bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar shing la me bzhin du //
translated: so is the Dharma in all things.

original: zhes bya ba ni gtsub stan dang gtsub shing gi nang na me gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gtsub stan dang gtsub shing gi nang na me gnas pa'o //
translated: The pervader is spoken of.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni til 'bru la sogs pa'i nang du gnas pa'i til mar la sogs pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni til 'bru la sogs pa'i nang du gnas pa'i til mar la sogs pa bzhin du'o //
translated: The phrase so is the Dharma in all things means that just as oil, etc., are in sesame seeds, etc., so the Dharma is in all things.

original: chos rnams thams cad la zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams la'o //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad la zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams la'o //
translated: The phrase in all things means in the aggregates, elements, sense bases, etc., which are characterized by the Dharma.

original: khyab byed brjod ces bya ba ni brjod ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyab byed brjod ces bya ba ni brjod ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase the pervader is spoken of means that it is spoken of as the pervader.

original: kyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnas pa la'o ;
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnas pa la'o ;
translated: “Also” means in the subsequent state.

original: / de ltar don rnam pa bzhis chos kyi dbyings mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: / de ltar don rnam pa bzhis chos kyi dbyings mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the brief explanation of the dharmadhātu in four topics,

original: da ni rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the extensive explanation,

original: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas /
translated: the dharmadhātu is explained in terms of its own nature,

original: shes par bya ba ma yin pa nyid ni /
analyzed: shes par bya ba ma yin pa nyid ni /
translated: which is not to be known,

original: nam mkha' bzhin du'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du'o //
translated: like space.

original: dri ma med ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa las dben pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dri ma med ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa las dben pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Stainless” means it is free from afflictions.

original: chos kun gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang shes byas bsdus pa'i chos ma lus pa rnams kyi rten to //
analyzed: chos kun gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang shes byas bsdus pa'i chos ma lus pa rnams kyi rten to //
translated: “Basis of all phenomena” means it is the support of all phenomena included in objects of knowledge and consciousness.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni bla na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni bla na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Supreme” means it is unsurpassed.

original: gal te de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na /
translated: If it is like that,

original: ci'i phyir de ltar mi snang zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar mi snang zhe na /
translated: why does it not appear as such?

original: de'i phyir bzung dang 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bzung dang 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “due to the apprehended and apprehender,”

original: yul dang yul can gyi ngo bos so //
analyzed: yul dang yul can gyi ngo bos so //
translated: in terms of the nature of object and subject.

original: kun rtog gi zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog rnams kyis so //
analyzed: kun rtog gi zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog rnams kyis so //
translated: “Imagination” means due to conceptual thoughts.

original: khyab kyang zhes bya ba ni bye brag tu khyab pa'o //
analyzed: khyab kyang zhes bya ba ni bye brag tu khyab pa'o //
translated: “Even though it pervades” means that it pervades in particular.

original: mthong ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bos shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bos shes pa ma yin te /
translated: “It is not seen” means that it is not known by the nature of its mode of being.

original: glo bur ba'i dri mas g-yogs pa'i phyir @211a * //🔽ro ; ; stong nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: glo bur ba'i dri mas g-yogs pa'i phyir @211a * // ro ; ; stong nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: Because it is covered by adventitious defilements.

original: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lus rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lus rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: “By the yoga of the wisdom of emptiness” means that the wisdom of emptiness, which is the antidote to the apprehended and apprehender, has the characteristic of the body’s emptiness.

original: de'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel pas so //
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel pas so //
translated: “By the yoga of that” means by the connection with that.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis sgom pa po rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis sgom pa po rnams kyis so //
translated: “By the yogi” means by those who meditate on the two stages.

original: mthong zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i rab mthar thug pa 'jug pa'i shes rab la gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i rab mthar thug pa 'jug pa'i shes rab la gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “It is seen” means that it appears clearly to the wisdom that engages at the culmination of meditation.

original: de ltar rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas shes par bya ba dang shes par bya ba ma yin pa nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas shes par bya ba dang shes par bya ba ma yin pa nyid bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of what is to be known and what is not to be known,🔽now, the explanation of the result of the two stages is taught.

original: da ni don dam pa nyid kyis de brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni don dam pa nyid kyis de brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to express that by means of the ultimate,

original: chos dbyings zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: chos dbyings zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, “the realm of phenomena,” etc.

original: chos dbyings zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: chos dbyings zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena is as before.

original: bha ga zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bha ga zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The bhaga is so called because it conquers all afflictions.

original: bshad ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bshad ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: The explanation is the expression.

original: bha ga de yang rin chen za ma tog ste /
analyzed: bha ga de yang rin chen za ma tog ste /
translated: And that bhaga is a jewel casket,

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is endowed with all the qualities of a buddha, having abandoned all adverse factors.

original: rin chen rnams kyi za ma tog ni rten no snyam du bsams nas so //
analyzed: rin chen rnams kyi za ma tog ni rten no snyam du bsams nas so //
translated: The casket of jewels is the support, thinking thus.

original: dbang phyug la sogs yon tan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs yon tan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The qualities of lordship, etc.🔽are lordship, good form,

original: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang //
analyzed: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang //
translated: glory, fame, fortune,

original: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ste //
analyzed: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ste //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom.

original: drug po 'di la skal zhes brjod //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: drug po 'di la skal zhes brjod // ces gsungs so //
translated: These six are called good fortune.

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan gyis so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan gyis so //
translated: For what reason?

original: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: “Endowed” means perfectly endowed.

original: de'i phyir bha ga ni brjod ces bya ba ni rgyu mtshan des na bha ga'i sgras brjod pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i phyir bha ga ni brjod ces bya ba ni rgyu mtshan des na bha ga'i sgras brjod pa'o ;
translated: Therefore, the bhaga is expressed.

original: / de ltar don dam pa nyid kyis de'i bshad pa brjod nas /
analyzed: / de ltar don dam pa nyid kyis de'i bshad pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus described it by way of the ultimate,

original: da ni kun rdzob pa'i ngo bos de'i bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /🔽bha ga chos rnams kun zhes bshad //
analyzed: da ni kun rdzob pa'i ngo bos de'i bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir / bha ga chos rnams kun zhes bshad //
translated: now, in order to teach its explanation by way of the conventional nature,

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: it is said:🔽The bhaga is explained as all phenomena.

original: chos ni phung po la sogs pa'i mchan nyid rnams skyed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos ni phung po la sogs pa'i mchan nyid rnams skyed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Phenomena are the characteristics of the aggregates and so on.

original: bha ga ni chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bha ga ni chos 'byung ngo //
translated: The bhaga is the source of phenomena.

original: dbyings ni sems zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi rdzas kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dbyings ni sems zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi rdzas kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The dhātu is said to be mind, the nature of conventional substance.

original: khams gsum po ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: khams gsum po ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: The three realms are the world.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar srid pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar srid pa'o //
translated: This is as it occurs.

original: rgyu ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni rgyu'o //
translated: The cause is the cause.

original: bha ga zhes byar bshad ces bya ba ni chos 'byung gi sgras brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bha ga zhes byar bshad ces bya ba ni chos 'byung gi sgras brjod pa'o //
translated: The bhaga is explained as the source of phenomena.

original: de ltar kun rdzob pa'i ngo @211b pos de'i bshad pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar kun rdzob pa'i ngo @211b pos de'i bshad pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus described it by way of the conventional,🔽now, in order to teach its explanation by way of the ultimate, it is said:

original: da ni nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas brjod du med pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas brjod du med pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach inexpressibility by way of summary, he says:

original: chos dbyings 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chos dbyings 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: This dharmadhatu is the nature of all phenomena,

original: de ma thag par bstan pa rnams so //
analyzed: de ma thag par bstan pa rnams so //
translated: which were just taught.

original: rnam par dag pa gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the nature of the two purities.

original: 'gyur ba med pa'i zhes bya ba ni rtag tu de nyid du yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa'i zhes bya ba ni rtag tu de nyid du yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is changeless because it always exists as such.

original: rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo ma bcos pas zhes bya pa'i don to //🔽yang dag sbyor dngos kyis zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba'i ngo bo ni 'brel pa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo ma bcos pas zhes bya pa'i don to // yang dag sbyor dngos kyis zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba'i ngo bo ni 'brel pa'i ngo bo ste /
translated: It is natural because it is unfabricated by way of its own essence.🔽It is the nature of the correct connection with all phenomena.

original: de nyid dang gzhan dag gis brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan dag gis brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: It is the nature of connection, which is characterized by inexpressibility in terms of sameness and difference.🔽Like the moon in water,

original: chu zla bzhin du zhes bya ba ni chu bo chu klung la sogs pa'i chu la'o //
analyzed: chu zla bzhin du zhes bya ba ni chu bo chu klung la sogs pa'i chu la'o //
translated: in the water of rivers and so forth.

original: zla ba zhes bya ba ni zla ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zla ba zhes bya ba ni zla ba bzhin du'o //
translated: Like the moon,

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: “Abiding” means remaining.

original: de ltar nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas brjod du med pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas brjod du med pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the inexpressible in terms of a summary,

original: da ni de nyid la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir /🔽don dam gcig pu de nyid shes //
analyzed: da ni de nyid la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir / don dam gcig pu de nyid shes //
translated: now, in order to express just that which is to be realized by the yogis,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says:

original: don dam gcig pu de nyid shes //
analyzed: don dam gcig pu de nyid shes //
translated: The yogis know that ultimate reality is one.🔽The yogis know that ultimate reality is one.

original: zhes pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected with “thus.”

original: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo ste /
translated: Ultimate reality is the essence of natural luminosity.

original: de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The yogis who abide in that🔽know that supreme reality

original: lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin //
analyzed: lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin //
translated: as it appears in the palm of the hand, like a myrobalan fruit.

original: de ltar snang zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i mthil du gnas pa'i skyu ru ra ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar snang zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i mthil du gnas pa'i skyu ru ra ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Thus it appears means that it appears like a myrobalan fruit resting in the palm of the hand.

original: mchog gi de nyid ces bya ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mchog gi de nyid ces bya ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Supreme reality is the supreme sphere of reality.

original: rang rig ces bya ba ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig ces bya ba ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba'o //
translated: Self-awareness means to be known by each one individually.

original: shin tu dri ma med ces bya ba ni rnam par dag pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu dri ma med ces bya ba ni rnam par dag pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase extremely pure means that it is endowed with the two purities.

original: dngos dang dngos med zad nas ni //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med zad nas ni //
translated: Having exhausted both entity and non-entity,

original: zhes bya ba ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i lta ba spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i lta ba spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: means that it is free from the views of eternalism and nihilism.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
translated: The word always means at all times.

original: mthong zhing zhes bya ba ni shin tu rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthong zhing zhes bya ba ni shin tu rtogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase one sees means that one fully realizes.

original: de nyid mthong zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi sgo nas spyod pa la gnas pa'i 'phags pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid mthong zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi sgo nas spyod pa la gnas pa'i 'phags pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase one sees thatness means that it is seen by the noble ones who abide in the practice through the door of mantra.

original: de ltar don rnam pa lngas rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa lngas rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained in detail through five topics,

original: da ni nye bar bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: da ni nye bar bsdu ba ni /
translated: now, the summary is stated:

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gsal ba //🔽zhes bya @212a * //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gsal ba // zhes bya @212a * //
translated: The elucidation of the term dharmadhatu

original: ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ba gsungs te /
translated: is stated.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig ces bya ba ni sgra'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig ces bya ba ni sgra'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The phrase the term dharmadhatu refers to the essence of sound.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam par dbye bas gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam par dbye bas gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The word elucidation means that it is clear due to the differentiation of meanings.

original: de ltar bshad ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rig pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar bshad ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rig pas bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus it is explained means that it is explained by the reasoning explained above.

original: shin tu rgyas par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: shin tu rgyas par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is said very extensively

original: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is explained extensively with a variety of natures.

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i 'brel pa ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni yul dang yul can gyi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid can dang 'brel pa bzlog pas so //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i 'brel pa ni // zhes bya ba ni yul dang yul can gyi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid can dang 'brel pa bzlog pas so //
translated: The connection between object and subject

original: shes par zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes par zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: is reversed, and knowledge means what is to be known.

original: rmad du byung zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa med par sems can gyi don la 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rmad du byung zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa med par sems can gyi don la 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid kyis so //
translated: It is said wonderful because it is the very cause of engaging in the welfare of sentient beings without effort.

original: ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is with amazement.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The Commentary on the Glorious Vajra Garland, the Tantra of the Great Yoga,

original: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: composed by the paṇḍita Alaṃkakalaśa,

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
translated: called Illuminating the Profound Meaning,

original: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: is the extensive explanation of the forty-first chapter.

original: // / de ltar le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pas chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pas chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the reply to the question regarding the domain of words of the dharmadhātu in the forty-first chapter,

original: da ni rdo rje'i tshig gi bshad pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje'i tshig gi bshad pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the reply to the question regarding the domain of the explanation of the vajra words,

original: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nye bar 'god par byed cing /
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nye bar 'god par byed cing /
translated: the forty-second chapter is begun.

original: dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de'i rtsom pa ni /
translated: First, the composition is as follows:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the explanation of the forty-first chapter,

original: bcom ldan rdo rjes rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gsungs //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rjes rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gsungs //
translated: the Bhagavān Vajra spoke the characteristics of the vajra.
